Job Description:
• Develop, implement and maintain HR policies and procedures to ensure  effective, fair, and consistent management of staff throughout the organization, and ensure that the staff handbook is comprehensive and up-to-date.
• Ensure that the managers and staff are aware of the policies and procedures and able to operate them effectively.
• Monitor and review the system of performance appraisal and continually develop as necessary, ensuring that annual appraisals are carried out in a timely manner and followed up.
• Ensure that the staff are informed and updated on key business and organizational issues.
• Make recommendations on a cost-effective management development programmer to support the Senior management regarding  strategies including trainings.
• Maintain training records for all staff and assist with any training initiatives as required.
• Represent HR & participate in various internal groups and committees across the organization.
• Review and manage new starter and leaver processes, including conducting exit interviews for all staff.
• Monitor HR trends throughout the organization and provide management information on key performance indicators to the Senior Management as appropriate.
• Manage the information held on the HR database and personnel files to ensure it is updated in timely and accurate manner and complies with any legal or data protection policies.
• To undertake other tasks as agreed by Finance & Admin Manager.
• To lead corporate Social responsibility initiatives such as chart work and team building exercises.
Job Requirement:
• Excellent communication skills. An HR Manager typically acts as link between the top management and the workers or employees. To get the point of each party across to the other effective and accurately, the manager must have excellent communications skills.
• Proven generalist experience including the ability to work at both strategic and operational levels.
• Fully conversant and up to date with all aspects of employment law and HR best practice.
• Experience in the development & implementation of employment policies and procedures.
• Experience at recruitment interviewing and assessment at senior level.
• Ability to work autonomously & flexibly.
• Influencing, persuading, coaching and negotiating skills.
• Ability to prepare & present reports to director level.
• Proficient in the use of MS Office applications, email and the internet.
• A good working knowledge of HR systems.

Job Description:
- Preparation of individual audit planning – data 
  collection, define key risk concerns, compile activities 
  chart, etc. and reviewing the work plan of IA.
- Taking lead of the individual internal audit team in each 
  audit as well as full support to the IA.
- Supervision and monitoring of works performed by the team 
  members.
- Review of works performed and reporting output by the 
  team.
- Preparation of the consolidated internal audit reports.
- Follow up on audit findings and its status of 
  implementations with the audit targets.
- Actively involved in controlling the departments under own 
  responsibilities with respect to risks management, cost 
  control management, business and controls risks – any 
  particular worrying issues pertaining to these should be 
  brought to the attention of the HIA/IAM, then meeting with 
  MJQE’s senior management for solutions.
- Provide training to the team members when deem necessary, 
  provide effective coaching to ensure effective knowledge 
  exchange and internal audit quality in its process and 
  output.
- Ensure that all audit activities are monitored and its 
  status be tracked against individual audit plan – audit 
  commencement date, completion date of the audit field 
  works, meeting notes etc.
- Ensure that all working practices at all stages are in 
  line with the approved Internal Audit Policies in term of 
  quality control procedures, sampling procedures, audit 
  testing procedures etc.
- Assist to design IA policy, procedure and guideline for IA 
  team to implement effectively.
- Actively involved in discussion of audit findings and its 
  status, provide feedback on effectiveness of post- audit 
  corrections process and give recommendation for changes.
- Other tasks assigned by the HIA/IAM.
Job Requirement:
- About 2 years of experience in the leadership role, of audit 
  experience is preferable.
- At least two years of experience in internal audit in the 
  microfinance/banking/audit firm/other sector or 4 years of 
  experience of finance/accounting in the 
  microfinance/banking/audit sector.
- Good understanding of Internal Control, finance, operational 
  and compliance.
- Strong computer skills (i.e. Microsoft Office) and good 
  understanding of IT system or other specific MIS.
- Ability to write timely, clear and concise reports on the 
  findings.
- Good written and spoken English, as well as communication 
  and interpersonal skills.
- High motivation and ability to work without supervision.
- Good understanding of Internal Control and processes.

job title: Sales & Marketing Director Chinese Very Urgent 3.0K-3.5K
position: Sales & Marketing Director Chinese Very Urgent 3.0K-3.5K
Job Description:
Sales & Marketing Director

  This would be an excellent opportunity for a person with passion and desire to advance their real estate career to a leadership/management role in an overseas country.
Applicants should be intuitive, proactive, motivated, organized, and have the ability to build rapport and engage clients at all levels. 
This role will see you responsible for managing, attracting and recruiting the best Sales Agent's with the end goal being growth in the revenues of the sales department in line with the company's targets.

Experience:

- You will ideally have previous experience in a Sales & Marketing Manager capacity or as a Senior Sales Agent ideally within the Real Estate or Property Industry. You will be inspirational & focused on excellence and have the ability to drive team performance. It will also be important that you are able to adapt quickly to new surroundings/culture and be able to identify top talent in local market place.
Job Requirement:
• Recruitment of New Sales People
• Conduct Weekly 1-1's with Sales Team
• Setting and Monitoring KPI's for Sales Team
• Manage, Mentor & Support the Sales Team
• Devise & Facilitate Training Sessions
• Developing relationships with clients/agents
• Pro-actively managing and qualifying enquiries
• Increasing market knowledge and developing a keen 
  awareness of competitor activity
• Arrange the weekly Sales report
• A high level of written and verbal communication skills
• A team player with high levels of integrity and honesty
• A positive, can do attitude
• A proven track record in the industry selling condominiums 
  off the plan and experience in managing relationships with 
  local and overseas real estate companies.

Additionally, you will also ideally have:

• Experience in developing and driving a sales team
• Strong reporting skills
• Excellent Communication, Influencing & Presentation Skills

Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.

job title: Legal Manager , Local and under 2.5 k
position: Legal Manager , Local and under 2.5 k
Job Description:
• Legal Manager is required to handle various legal matters after understanding the client's case. 
• Legal Manager needs to offer advice on managing the tender documents. 
• Legal Manager needs to review the existing legal cases of the organization and work upon resolving them. 
• Legal Manager is involved in hiring members for the legal department after assessing their skills and abilities. 
• Legal Manager is required to train the newly joined staff members on various legal aspects. 
• Legal Manager needs to provide legal advice to the management. 
• Legal Manager is required to analyze the risks while signing new business deals. 
• Legal Manager needs to analyze legal information and do the essential paperwork. 
• Legal Manager is required to handle litigation management. 
• Legal Manager is required to review contracts and agreements and see to it that they comply with the legal norms. 
• Legal Manager is required to deal with external law authorities. 
• Legal Manager needs to review the legal risks involved in various business deals and share the same with the management.
Job Requirement:
• Graduated from Law major.

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

- Professional English speaking and writing skill, able

- Ability to work independently as well as

Job Description:
 Participate in strategic & long-term planning of the 
  Company strategic direct investment projects including 
  land acquisitions, divestments, project finance and 
  mergers and acquisitions.
 Screen, evaluate and execute investment opportunities 
  that comply with the request from Management team, 
  including private equity, and direct or co-investment 
  opportunities.
 Oversee and endorse land valuations using various 
  methodologies including, but not limited to, 
  discounted cash flow, direct comparison (with accurate 
  market comparable) or depreciated replacement cost 
  (when doable), foster valuation process improvements
 Carry out feasibility studies and present 
  recommendations pertaining to potential land 
  developments, collaborate and work closely with the 
  Acquisition Department to present detailed reports and 
  analysis, support draft and presentation of all 
  investment proposals
 Lead market studies and researches pertaining to 
  lands, residential & commercial real estates in areas 
  such as offer, demand, pricing, trends, market 
  constraints & practices
 Design surveys pertaining to direct and indirect 
  competitors’ positioning and strategies
 Compile and archive data, build consulting 
  capabilities serving company’s investment and 
  development projects, monitor actual market forces, 
  new entrants and entry modes
 Understand and proactively detect emerging trends and 
  shifts in local/regional lifestyles
 Evaluate the competitive landscape by preparing 
  benchmarking analysis and evaluation in regards to 
  Cambodia and other neighboring markets in the Great 
  Mekong Sub region
 Contribute to project conceptualization phase, project 
  branding and marketing strategy
Job Requirement:
 Bachelor’s degree or above in Real Estate, Property 
  Development or related fields,
 Minimum 7 years of working experience in property 
  valuation for the purposes, joint venture, bank 
  security, secured lending, tax audit and property 
  development
 Fluent in at least two of the following languages – 
  English, Chinese and Khmer.
 Strong analytical and problem-solving skills as well 
  as critical and logical thinking skills
 Good communication, oral & written, strong analytical, 
  interpersonal & leadership skills
 Understand the local business conditions & complexity 
  of doing valuation in Cambodia

Job Description:
• Coordinating all public relations activities
• Develop a marketing communications plan including 
  strategy, goals, budget and tactics
• Develop media relations strategy, seeking high-level 
  placements in print, broadcast and online media
• Coordinate all public relations activities
• Direct social media team to engage audiences across 
  traditional and new media
• Leverage existing media relationships and cultivate 
  new contacts within business and industry media
• Manage media inquiries and interview requests
• Create content for press releases, byline articles and 
  keynote presentations
• Monitor, analyze and communicate PR results on a 
  quarterly basis
• Evaluate opportunities for partnerships, sponsorships 
  and advertising on an on-going basis.
• Build relationships with thought leaders to grow 
  industry awareness
• Maintain a keen understanding of industry trends 
  affecting clients and make appropriate recommendations 
  regarding communication strategy surrounding them
Job Requirement:
• Proven 3-5 years of working experience in public 
  relations area with sizeable companies in property 
  development and other mixed industries big 
  organizations.
• Bachelor/Master degree in Marketing, Advertising, 
  Communications or a related discipline.
• Exceptional writing and editing skills in English 
  (must), Khmer and/or Chinese (preferred).
• Proven track record designing and executing successful 
  public relations campaigns at both a local and 
  international level
• Strong relationships with both local and international 
  business and industry media outlets
• Experience in acting as a company spokesperson; 
  comfortable and skilled in both broadcast and print 
  media interviews
• Solid experience with social media including blogs, 
  Facebook, Twitter, etc.

Job Description:
- Reporting directly to General Manager/Site Manager and supervision day to day operation of site work.
- Follow up contractor and/or sub-contractor to ensure that work is being carried out as per design/ specification/or planning.
- Checking technical designs and drawing to ensure that they are followed correctly. 
- Supervising sub-contracted workers.
- Making the calculation about pressures, loads and stresses.
- Analyze configuration of basic components of structure.
- Consider the strength of construction materials and select appropriately.   
- Providing technical advice and solving problem on site
- Conducting regular job site inspections, plan and oversee the construction of new buildings.
- Understanding about Décor work.
- Understanding of water proof and water proof products is advantage.
- Identify and highlight possible risk on project accurately inventorying construction material.
- Ensuring that health and safety on site work.
Job Requirement:
- Degree in Civil Engineering and other equivalent degree.
- At least 1year experience as site engineer.
- Be able to use application 2D & 3D, AutoCAD.
- Can work under pressure.
- Water proof skills is advantage.
- Team Work Player.
- Responsibility with work.
- Be able to manage workers at site

** Working Days and Hours:
- Monday to Saturday: 7:00am to 11:00am & 1:00pm to 5:00pm
- Lunch time: 11:00am to 1:00pm

Job Description:
- Provide good leadership to direct report in the daily execution of recruitment and admin work for outsourcing projects.
- Provide coaching & guidance to grow direct report in role, and ensure direct report delivers best performance and satisfied services to internal stakeholders
- Develop a good understanding of client’s company, their industry, products and services, culture and work environment, etc.
- Recruit applicants through different channels (i.e. job ads, referrals, social and professional networks, etc.), and maintain their profiles in a proper database
- Work with HR Project Coordinators and HR Business Partners to control and monitor the recruitment process through to the complete placement of qualified applicants
- Attend various networking events (i.e. career fair) to look for potential applicants
- Interview job seekers and prepare shortlists of applicants for referral to prospective HR Project Coordinators/HR Business Partner based on their skills and abilities
- Work closely with prospective HR Project Coordinators and Business Partner to ensure new hire/replacement candidate filled on time and meet expectation of clients
- Present and educate job opportunities to potential applicants according to work their relevant work experience and skill sets
- Check references and suitability of applicants before referral to Project Coordinator/clients
- Assist applicants to prepare resumes and advise them on personal presentation at interviews
- Follow up with HR Project Coordinators and HR Business Partners for the performance of applicants
- Track management report, candidate recruitment, and other administrative support functions
- Prepare weekly/ monthly recruitment/vacancies report and send to line Manager
- Build pool of candidates which are relevant to the positions of existing staff outsourcing project and/or upcoming new project
- Build relationships with HR Project Coordinators, team, colleagues, and management in order to get smooth corporation and support
- Build relationships with other recruiters and clients to have their insight and recommended candidates
- Support Recruitment Department when emergency needed and/or free from day to day work
- Performed other task as required from time to time
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Business Administration or any other related fields
- At least 3 years’ experience in recruitment and selection
- Good communication skill
- Pleasant personality
- Proven negotiation skills and ability to persuade and influence decision makers
- Strong planning and organizational skills and ability to multitask
- Competent in using Microsoft Office, Internet, emails, etc.
- Experience in the staffing industry is an advantage
- Ability to work well under pressure
- Able to travel to any province
- Have driving license

Job Description:
- Work with the design team to fully understand the Master-plan of the particular project
- Work with the design team to fully understand the project infrastructure plan with absolute accuracy of the road, drainage and MEP layouts.
- Read the structure drawings of each house in the project and give instruction to the survey machine operators to locate key locational points, structure line and lines for finishing work such as floor, door and window levels. 
- Devise the project team (survey) efficiently and divide the job effectively among teams
- Work in close collaboration with site engineers to ensure the correct installation of re-bars and form work in strict compliance with the specifications of column, beam and slab dimension. 
- Assist the structure engineers in their coordination and relation with the sub-contractors and vendors. 
- Intervene when there are conflicts between site engineers and sub-contractors or vendors
- Coordinate venders’ work to ensure smooth site work progress and ensure that no one team’s work is held up by other teams. 
- Supervise the sub-contractors’ and venders’ work to ensure order and safety at the construction site
- Maintain staff job results by counseling and disciplining employees; planning, monitoring, and appraising job results.
Job Requirement:
- Degree in Civil Engineering and other equivalent degree
- At least 1 year & experience as site engineer
- Be able to use application 2D & 3D, AutoCAD
- Can work under pressure
- Good Understanding of Construction
- Team Work Player
- Responsibility with work
- Be able to manage workers at site
** Working Days and Hours:
- Monday to Saturday: 7:00am to 11:00pm & 1:00pm to 5:00pm
- Lunch time: 11:00am to 1:00pm
** Working place:
- is based at Site Project in Khan Chbar Ampov, Phnom Penh.
** Relationship:
- Works under supervision & report directly to Surveying Engineer Team Leader/Site Manager.
** Salary and Benefit:
- Salary (Negotiable)
- Meal Allowance.
- Phone Allowance.

- Annual Salary increment.
- Annual Staff Party.

Job Description:
-Greet and care for all patients within your care in a polite and courteous manner at all times
-Always be aware of patients’ confidentially and data (health history) protection
-Inform reception of any reason to delay next appointment 
-Be fully conversant with all emergency and evaluation procedures 
- Promote a professional image of the company at all time
- Maintain in all treatment cares, ensuring that dentists are chaperoned at all times when treating patients
- Assistant patient into treatment, settle them in the chair and prepare them for treatment 
-Provide patients with personal protective equipment
- Ensure all lab work is checked and available prior to patient arrival
- Develop and file all X-ray, whilst adhering to the relevant safety procedures
- Maintain a clean environment during treatment
- Clean and sterilize all instruments after each patient, adhering to the company policy on cross regulations
- Escort the patient form the treatment and when necessary to the reception& waiting area
-Ensure all equipment is maintained as per manufacturers instructions and are cleared appropriately
-Responsible room and switch equipment on/in the morning and ensure it is switch off again at the end of each working session
- Ensure that adequate material and equipment are available
- Ensure that all repairs are reported promptly to the line manager
- Make temporary crown to patients
- Take X-ray.
Job Requirement:
-Experience candidate in primary dental care, practice or equivalence in secondary dental care
-At least high school degree
-National certificate of dental nursing 
-English and Mathematics at standard grade or equivalence
-Customer care skill and good communication skill
- Ability to communication in English
- Good interpersonal skill
-Team Player 
- Good attitude 
- Good English
- Dedication, creativity, flexible and adaptable
- Ability to work and remain calm under pressure 
- Pleasant personality 
- Honesty
- Salary depend on experience

Job Description:
- To pro-actively contribute to the formulation and direction of the retail strategy and implement projects and trials for the Area,
- To support the management of customer service activities and staff competence so as to optimize and sustain sales performance and customer satisfaction,
- To effectively manage the P&L within allocated budget in order to affect a profitable performance for the Area,
- To manage budgets in line with Area sales performance and to deal with all staff issues.
- To ensure that all stores adhere to compliance requirement in all areas of operational activity, company policies and procedures,
- To clearly and concisely communicate business and Area objectives to managers so that they remain well informed of business activity and of their required contribution to targets, 
- To achieve stock control targets inline with company guidelines to prevent financial loss,
- To liaise with the Buying and Merchandising teams regarding the supply of stock in the Area to maximize stock potential,
- To identify underperforming stores and develop a business plan to address and manage issues effectively,
- To achieve successful Mystery Shop results through the development and training of managers,
- To collate and provide constructive feedback on VM standards to the business,
- To ensure that the visual presentation of all stores represents the brand image,
- To support the delivery of all marketing campaigns,
- To develop an effective network of communication across the Area to ensure shared knowledge and understanding of business activity
- To encourage managers to seek and continuously develop knowledge of competitor activity and local market conditions, with the purpose of making appropriate and innovative recommendations to drive the business forward.
- To encourage managers to identify trends and make suggestions to improve and enhance product performance to drive brand achievement,
- To recruit and ensure the full implementation of induction programs for new store managers and monitor ongoing performance needs,
- To effectively manage the performance and development of store personnel to drive and maximize the sale performance throughout the Area,
- To plan for succession in the Area through the identification of individuals with potential for development and growth,
- To create a positive environment that results in stable retention and a reduction of labour turnover.
- In the absence of a merchandising buying team to take the lead in buying for the stores utilizing information to ensure that they achieve sales projections.
- To organize events promotion displays as required by the business.
Job Requirement:
- At least a BA in general management or related field work.
- At least 2 years’ experience in retail management, - experience with international retails is a great advantage, 
- Good planning, time management, commitment, focused, flexible, opportunity seeker, costumer oriented,
- Independent and result oriented 
- Strong leadership, communication, people and analytical skills.
- Willingness to work under challenging environment 
- Excellent command of English and Khmer, Chinese is great advantage
- Extensive experiences in all aspects of supplier Relationship Management.
- Strong understanding of customer and market dynamics and requirements
- Willingness to travel and work in a global team of professional 
- Proven leadership and ability to drive sale teams.
- Experience from Super Market, Mart, Mall is Preffered

Job Description:
- Providing support for clients by learning about and 
  satisfying their needs.
- Making cold calls or reaching out to prospects.
- Following up with prospects several times throughout the 
  sales cycle to ensure needs are being met.

Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.

Company Profile: AIA Cambodia is guided by our Purpose to help Cambodians live Healthier, Longer, Better lives. Since commencing business in 2017, we’ve become the first life insurer to provide coverage on 26 critical illnesses. As among the Kingdom’s leading insurers, AIA Cambodia today offers market-leading life solutions for all walks of life ranging from tailor-made crucial coverage plans that include critical illnesses, accidents, hospital allowances and overseas emergency assistance.AIA Cambodia has strived to make a significant, positive impact for our customers and communities. As we look to the future, this commitment is reinforced by our Purpose: to help millions of people live Healthier, Longer, Better Lives. Our Purpose guides the decisions we make and the actions we take as an organization — empowering and enabling people to understand and manage their health, while meeting their long-term savings and protection needs. Helping create a healthier Asia is one of the most important and valuable things we can do for our communities, today and tomorrow.AIA Cambodia is the only Cambodian life insurer awarded HR Asia’s “Best Companies to Work for in Asia” for three consecutive years, in 2020, 2021 and 2022. Headquartered in Phnom Penh, the company currently has branches in Siem Reap, Kampot, Kampong Cham and Battambang.

Job Description:
Operational:

-Help in managing all technical equipment and other related solutions to specified international standards
-Support in ensuring 99.9% Disaster Recovery readiness and high availability
-Ensure that the daily operational checklist is effectively monitored / completed.
-Help maintaining system security for all related systems.
-Assist in ISO 27001:2013 compliance requirements and related audits
-Formulate or update IT procedures as and when required 
-Support for hardware/ software problems and report the issue for local or group support if required.
-Self-improve knowledge by researching advancements in IT System technologies.
-Run daily/ periodical processing (morning, evening, month-end, year-end, etc…).
-Follow up any SW/HW licenses related to infrastructure/tools.
-Help the IT team on correcting security related audit findings and coordinate with auditors.
-Assist in responding to IT Audit Reports.
-Any other duties within your competence or skill entrusted by the management   

Technical:

-Ensuring all Network infrastructure, Hardware/Servers and software is ready for daily operations
-Manage / monitored web certificates (SSL) related to system for upgrade, renewal and etc. 
-Responsibility on VM infrastructure (Implementation, installation, troubleshooting, etc.) 
-Responsibility on Windows Active Directory infrastructure (Implementation, installation, troubleshooting, etc.) 
-Assist in administration/setup and monitoring of IT asset inventory.
-Manage system users as per IT policy and procedure
-Carryout Vulnerability Assessments and providing recommendations under the guidance of group IT Security / CIO
-Monitoring physical security of IT premises, compliance with IT security policy, procedure with other third parties and server room.
-Monitor and assist in management of all security, wireless, DHCP, BYOD devices to ensure required security controls are implemented.
-Check and control to log file and data information to make it is safe and usable.
-Check and monitor all system configurations comply with IT security standards.

* What You Will Get from Us:

-The chosen candidate will have adequate exposure for latest technologies adopted by LOLC Cambodia or Group IT. 
-The chosen candidate will undergo a comprehensive guidance on IT Infrastructure, international security standard and will work with LOLC Group IT team.
-Will be working with experts in Software Development, Core banking, System Security and other related departments to share the experience.
-Flexible working hours (Conditions Apply).
-Local and foreign training opportunities conducted by Certified Trainers/LOLC Group.
-An attractive package with other benefits such as medical facilities, Staff loan facilities, etc.
Job Requirement:
What We Seek from You:

-Bachelor’s Degree in Information Technology or related fields.
-Preferably with a minimum of 2-3 years of experience in MFIs/banking or related fields.
-2-3 years of experience in Systems Administration in Microsoft Windows and Linux Base infrastructure.
-Understanding networking protocol and network process flow.
-Experiences in virtualization and cloud computing (preference will be given for candidate certified in VCP-DCV 6.7).
-Analyzing and resolving End-User workstation issue including network printers, access points, branch level network switch, router, etc.
-Experience in system monitoring and troubleshooting.
-Documentation / writing skills and an excellent command of English language. 
-Strong communication skill.
-Experience with general IT projects.
-Ability to work under pressure and extended hours when required.
-Willingness to travel to provinces when required.



* Location: Head Office	
* Deadline: October 14, 2020

Company Profile:
Sunny Bank was established on October 2, 1957 which provides various banking products and services in Taiwan. Now Sunny Bank has 105 branches in Taiwan, total assets are USD 21.7 billion, and ranks 654th in “The Banker 2021” top 1000 world bank list by tier 1 capital. For providing overall financial services to customers, Sunny Bank also owns various financial field subsidiary such as Sunny Securities Co., Ltd., Sunny Assets Management Co., Ltd., Sunny E-Commerce Co., Ltd., Sunny International Leasing Co., Ltd. in Taiwan, as well as Sunny International Leasing Co., Ltd. (China) in Shanghai, China. Sunny Microfinance Plc. is 100% subsidiary owned by Sunny Bank.

We will continue to provide small and micro credits loan to Cambodian people via our operating branches in Cambodia. Our management team has good experiences and consolidate staff training schemes for developing the professional personal and corporate financial services in Taiwan. Meanwhile, Sunny Microfinance Plc. will be devoted to becoming a solid financial institution which grows with the path of economic growth in Cambodia.

Company Profile:
From a very humble beginning as a small roofing sheet roll former in 1997, ISI STEEL, A member of ISI GROUP, has successfully transformed itself from a family-run business into a midsize corporation leading Cambodia's steel processing industry. With modern processing facilities, world-class management systems and technology, dedicated staff and nationwide distribution networks serving our customers nationwide, ISI STEEL has become a truly reliable and respectable local brand synonymous with quality roofing and wall cladding systems and structural steel products.

This would not have been possible without the strong support of our customers, local and international business partners, our staff's dedication and hard work, and last but not least the government efforts for maintaining the political stability and sustainable economic growth. To ensure our company’s sustainable development and industry-leading position, we are committed to further invest in upgrading our manufacturing facilities, expanding our distribution network, building up our human capital, technology infrastructure, and product innovations to better meet our customer's need and expectation.

While continuing to strengthen our core capabilities in the manufacturing and distribution of quality coated steel products, we have over the years ventured into a number of related diversifications such as pre-engineering steel building fabrication, property development including industrial park, residential, offices and resorts developments, and other construction materials trading business through our subsidiary and affiliated companies to capture the opportunities in the growing economy of Cambodia.

Company Profile:
FTB is Cambodia's first and foremost bank. It is a private commercial bank and has been providing customers with safe and reliable banking services for 40 years. 

The Bank was created following Sub-decree No. 1213 dated 10 October 1979 under the former regime of the State of Cambodia. In 2000, the Bank was          separated from the direct management of the National Bank of Cambodia ("the Central Bank") in order to transform its permanent identity into a state-owned commercial bank in Cambodia with the features of a Public Economic Enterprise and with the intention of conducting autonomous business              operations. 

In January 2001, the Bank obtained its banking license from the Central Bank to operate as a commercial bank in the Kingdom of Cambodia for a period of      three years starting from 4 January 2001. This was the first license granted to enable the Bank to operate as a separate legal entity independent from the Central Bank's direct management. On 8 January 2004, the Bank obtained its 2nd banking license from the Central Bank for a period of three years starting    from that date. The Bank now holds a commercial banking license, which was renewed for an indefinite period, on 21 December 2006

On 31 December 2002, the Ministry of Economy and Finance ("MEF") announced, through a Statement of Intent, the privatisation of the Bank as part of the   reform of the financial sector of the Royal Government of Cambodia. On 28 October 2005 the shareholders of the Bank, represented by the Privatisation   Committee, entered into a sales agreement with Canadia Bank and ING Holding Company. The Central Bank sold its 20% shareholding in the Bank and MEF   reduced its 80% shareholding to 10%. In 2009, in accordance with the recommendation of the Central Bank, Canadia Bank reduced its shares from 48% to  15.22% and 2 new private shareholders having respectively a share of 15.39%, entered the capital of FTB. The Bank's Memorandum and Articles of

job title: Senior Product and Process Management Officer
position: Senior Product and Process Management Officer
Job Description:
Work with relevant departments to create product plans and roadmaps.

    Collect and analyze feedback from customers, stakeholders and other teams to shape requirements, features, processes and end products.

    Produce and review product requirements documents (PRD).

- Prepare and execute loan application/credit memo.
- Monitor/follow up customer repayment daily and solve later repayment in a timely manner, avoiding the debt being a serious debt.
- Assess local market conditions and identify current and prospective sales opportunities for Loan products and others banks’ products & services.
- Bring out the best of branch’s personnel by providing training, coaching, development and motivation.
- Performs other various duties as assigned.


015-Chamkar Doung   Lending Specialist, MSME	01
013- Pur Sen Chey   Lending Specialist, MSME	01
016- Mao Tse Tung   Lending Specialist, MSME	01
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor of Business Administration in Management or Finance and Banking or in any related field.
- At least one year’s experience in Microfinance or banking industry or another related field
- Acceptable written and verbal communication skills (Khmer and English).
- Good commitment in fieldwork and strong willing to work with rural people.
- Good understanding of Cambodian MFI/banking rules and regulations.
- Sound working knowledge of Computer (Ms. Word, Ms. Excel, Flexcube, Email).
- Honesty, Initiative, creatively, high commitment and good inter-personal skill, and able to manage and lead team for success

PhillipBank provides competitive salary (based on experience and performance) and benefits as follows:
1. Sales Incentive & Annual Performance Bonus
2. Pchum Ben Bonus
3. 13th Month Salary
4. Personal Accident & Term Life Insurance
5. Outpatient Consultation & Treatment
6. Public Holidays follow Labor Law
7. Five Working days per week.
8. Staff Loans with special interest rate
9. Training & Development Opportunities

Company Profile:
Phillip Bank Plc. is a member of PhillipCapital Group which is headquartered in Singapore, and established since 1975. The Group offers a full range of quality and innovative services to retail, corporate and institutional customers and currently operates in over 15 countries including Australia, Cambodia, China (as well as Hong Kong), France, India, Indonesia, Japan, Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand, Turkey, UK, UAE, USA and Vietnam.  

We were established in Cambodia in 2009 under HwangDBS Commercial Bank Plc. and in 2014, PhillipCapital Group bought it over and renamed it as Phillip Bank. In year 2020, the merger between Phillip Bank Plc. and KREDIT Microfinance Institution Plc. concluded successfully and made us one of the largest commercial bank with more than 70 branches in Cambodia.

Employee experience is our priority in Phillip Bank, in the process of achieving our corporate goals, we will put every effort towards our people’s growth. We are proud of our bank’s culture where: We treat our employee as family members; we always strive to meet our customer’s expectation and we believe in benefitting the communities.

Job Description:
Oversees performance and productivity of digital products and services office to promote fee income; ensure effective management with branches and Customer Care Center in communicating digital products and services campaigns, business support, and development or improvement of business/operation processes, policies, and guidelines.
Allocates resources to support new/existing digital products and services development or customization projects.
Manage clearing and settlement with partners, card schemes, 3rd parties, and regulators and liaise with them to resolve issues and expand business and coverage.
Supervises dispute resolution and customer complaints with regards to utilization of digital products and services with relevant parties including reporting to competent authorities.
Proposes operation action plans and business strategies to senior management to achieve long term business growth and sustainability of digital banking department.
Liaise with concerned departments and business units to successfully rollout digital products/services to the market while ensuring compliance and instant risk mitigation.
Provide regular and ad hoc trainings on new/existing digital products/services to sales teams, branches, customer care center card center, and other need-to-know employees.
Job Requirement:
At least tertiary qualification in business, finance, management, or related fields.
At least 5-year experience in banking field with track records in product/service UAT, process and policy development, launch, implementation strategies, clearing and settlement with card scheme and partners.
Good team member and leader with ability to build up rapport with departments and business units across the bank.
Result-oriented personality with motives to drive and achieve defined targets.
English proficiency, excellent interpersonal, writing and oral communication skills, ability to work under pressure, and excellent computer literacy, e.g., MS applications, and other computer programs.
A strong desire to work in a team and deal with challenge.
Good organizational skill, time management, and team building.High initiative, commitment, good communication and problem solving skills.
Company Profile:
FTB is Cambodia's first and foremost bank. It is a private commercial bank and has been providing customers with safe and reliable banking services for 40 years. 

The Bank was created following Sub-decree No. 1213 dated 10 October 1979 under the former regime of the State of Cambodia. In 2000, the Bank was          separated from the direct management of the National Bank of Cambodia ("the Central Bank") in order to transform its permanent identity into a state-owned commercial bank in Cambodia with the features of a Public Economic Enterprise and with the intention of conducting autonomous business              operations. 

In January 2001, the Bank obtained its banking license from the Central Bank to operate as a commercial bank in the Kingdom of Cambodia for a period of      three years starting from 4 January 2001. This was the first license granted to enable the Bank to operate as a separate legal entity independent from the Central Bank's direct management. On 8 January 2004, the Bank obtained its 2nd banking license from the Central Bank for a period of three years starting    from that date. The Bank now holds a commercial banking license, which was renewed for an indefinite period, on 21 December 2006

On 31 December 2002, the Ministry of Economy and Finance ("MEF") announced, through a Statement of Intent, the privatisation of the Bank as part of the   reform of the financial sector of the Royal Government of Cambodia. On 28 October 2005 the shareholders of the Bank, represented by the Privatisation   Committee, entered into a sales agreement with Canadia Bank and ING Holding Company. The Central Bank sold its 20% shareholding in the Bank and MEF   reduced its 80% shareholding to 10%. In 2009, in accordance with the recommendation of the Central Bank, Canadia Bank reduced its shares from 48% to  15.22% and 2 new private shareholders having respectively a share of 15.39%, entered the capital of FTB. The Bank's Memorandum and Articles of
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  023862111 hr@ftb.com.kh Phnom Penh Building No. 33 C-D, Tchecoslovaquie Blvd (169), Sangkat Veal Vong, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 023862111

Company Profile:
From a very humble beginning as a small roofing sheet roll former in 1997, ISI STEEL, A member of ISI GROUP, has successfully transformed itself from a family-run business into a midsize corporation leading Cambodia's steel processing industry. With modern processing facilities, world-class management systems and technology, dedicated staff and nationwide distribution networks serving our customers nationwide, ISI STEEL has become a truly reliable and respectable local brand synonymous with quality roofing and wall cladding systems and structural steel products.

This would not have been possible without the strong support of our customers, local and international business partners, our staff's dedication and hard work, and last but not least the government efforts for maintaining the political stability and sustainable economic growth. To ensure our company’s sustainable development and industry-leading position, we are committed to further invest in upgrading our manufacturing facilities, expanding our distribution network, building up our human capital, technology infrastructure, and product innovations to better meet our customer's need and expectation.

While continuing to strengthen our core capabilities in the manufacturing and distribution of quality coated steel products, we have over the years ventured into a number of related diversifications such as pre-engineering steel building fabrication, property development including industrial park, residential, offices and resorts developments, and other construction materials trading business through our subsidiary and affiliated companies to capture the opportunities in the growing economy of Cambodia.

 Support System (iSwitch / iCard / iCore / iSettle)
 Create system users and support end users.

 Working with Vendor to implement project and fix all system issues.
 Keep Monitoring System performance to up and running 24/7.
 Deploy patch Fix or Change Request to Production.

 Maintenance the HSM (Host Security Module) and NAC
 Generate VISA GOC report for Digital Department.
 Prepare monthly System Performance Report and report to Managements and relevant teams.
 Perform other tasks assigned by supervisors.

 Bachelor Degree of IT or related field

 Good knowledge and understanding of electronic banking and banking products and services
 Good organizational and time management skills
 A strong desire to work in a team oriented
 High initiative, commitment, good communication and problem solving skills.
 Computer literacy and English language proficiency.

job title: ភ្នាក់ងារសន្តិសុខ (ចំនួន ០៤ នាក់ បម្រើការនៅភ្នំពេញ)
position: ភ្នាក់ងារសន្តិសុខ (ចំនួន ០៤ នាក់ បម្រើការនៅភ្នំពេញ)
Job Description:
ភ្នាក់ងារសន្តិសុខ (ចំនួន ០៤ នាក់ បម្រើការនៅភ្នំពេញ)
បម្រើការងារនៅការិយាល័យកណ្តាល និងតាមបណ្តាសាខា ក្នុងទីក្រុងភ្នំពេញ ។ ភា្នក់ងារសន្តិសុខធនាគារ ត្រូវទទួលខុសត្រូវ លើការ
សម្របសម្រួល និងថែរក្សានូវ សន្តិសុខ សណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ជូនការិយាល័យធនាគារ ក៏ដូចអតិថិជន របស់ធនាគារ ។

កិច្ចការចម្បងៗ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវ

-	ថែទាំ និងរក្សានូវសន្តិសុខ សណ្តាប់ធ្លាប់ និងសុវត្ថិភាព ជូនអតិថិជនទាំងខាងក្នុង និងខាងក្រៅ ដើម្បីផ្តល់នូវជំនឿទុកចិត្តជូនអតិថិជន ក៏ដូចសាធារណជន
-	រៀបចំសម្រួលចំណតចេញ-ចូល ជូនអតិថិជនទាំងខាងក្នុង និងខាងក្រៅ របស់ធនាគារ ឲ្យមានរៀបរបប តាមលក្ខណៈបច្ចេកទេស 
-	សម្រួលចំណតចេញ-ចូល និងធ្វើចរាចរណ៍ ឲ្យបានទាន់ពេលវេលា ធានាបាននូវភាពមិនកកស្ទះចរាចរណ៍ នៅមុខការិយាល័យ
-	ជួយរក្សា និងថែទាំឧបករណ៍-សម្ភារ និងសារពើភ័ណ្ឌទាំងអស់របស់ការិយាល័យធនាគារ ដោយធានាបាននូវដំណើរការល្អ ដើម្បីបម្រើជូនអតិថិជន 
-	ជួយសម្រួល និងលើកដាក់ឧបករណ៍-សម្ភារ ឯកសារ និងកិច្ចការបម្រើប្រតិបត្តិការប្រចាំថ្ងៃ របស់ធនាគារ ក៏ដូចអតិថិជន ដែលមកកាន់ការិយាល័យធនាគារ ដើម្បីធានាបាននូវសន្តិសុខ សុវត្ថិភាព និងការបម្រើល្អ
-	ទទួលស្វាគមន៍ រាក់ទាក់ជូនអតិថិជនចេញ-ចូល និងចង្អុលបង្ហាញឆ្ពោះទៅកាន់កន្លែងបម្រើតាមតម្រូវការ ជូនអតិថិជន ប្រកប ដោយភាពរួសរាយ រាក់ទាក់ និងវិជ្ជាជីវៈខ្ពស់ 
-	បម្រើកិច្ចការផ្សេងៗទៀត ដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធក្នុងតួនាទី ជូនអតិថិជន ដែលអញ្ជើញមកដល់ការិយាល័យធនាគារ ។
Job Requirement:
លក្ខណសម្បត្តិ និងបទពិសោធន៍
-	យ៉ាងតិចមានសញ្ញាបត្របឋមភូមិ (សញ្ញាបត្រថ្នាក់ទី ៩ (Bac I) )
-	ជានីតិជន ដែលមានសញ្ជាតិជាខ្មែរ និងចេះអាន សរសេរ ភាសាខ្មែរបានល្អ ។ ចេះភាសាអង់គ្លេស ត្រូវបានលើកទឹកចិត្ត
-	មានបទពិសោធន៍ពាក់ព័ន្ធនឹងកិច្ចការសន្តិសុខ សណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់សាធារណៈ ត្រូវបានផ្តល់អាទិភាព
-	មានស្មារតីទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ និងមានការអត់ធន់ជាមួយការងារ ក៏ដូចលក្ខខណ្ឌការងាររបស់ធនាគារ
-	មានលក្ខណសម្បត្តិក្នុងការប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងល្អ រួសរាយ រាក់ទាក់ និងមានឥរិយាបថចេះបម្រើអតិថិជន
-	មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ សុចរិតភាព អត់ធ្មត់ និងសកម្មលើការងារ 
-	អាចលះបង់នូវពេលវេលាផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន ដើម្បីទទួលនូវការបម្រើជូនធនាគារ និងអតិថិជន ។
របៀបដាក់ពាក្យ
បេក្ខជនដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ សូមអញ្ជើញផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (មានបិទរូបថត) ជាមួយលិខិតអមជាភាសាខ្មែរ/អង់គ្លេសមកធនាគារតាមរយៈអ៊ីម៉ែលៈ HR@ftbbank.com ឬការិយាល័យកណ្តាល ស្ថិតនៅអគារលេខ ៣៣C-D ផ្លូវលេខ ១៦៩ សង្កាត់វាលវង់ ខណ្ឌ ៧មករា រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ​ ទល់មុខវិទ្យាល័យបាក់ទូក ឬតាមសាខាណាមួយ របស់ធនាគារពាណិជ្ជកម្មក្រៅប្រទេស នៃកម្ពុជា ។ មានតែបេក្ខជនដែលមានលក្ខណៈសម្បត្តិ
គ្រប់គ្រាន់នឹងត្រូវបានជាប់ក្នុងបញ្ជីសម្រាំង និងត្រូវបានទូរស័ព្ទអញ្ជើញឲ្យមកចូលសម្ភាសន៍ ។
Company Profile:
FTB is Cambodia's first and foremost bank. It is a private commercial bank and has been providing customers with safe and reliable banking services for 40 years. 

The Bank was created following Sub-decree No. 1213 dated 10 October 1979 under the former regime of the State of Cambodia. In 2000, the Bank was          separated from the direct management of the National Bank of Cambodia ("the Central Bank") in order to transform its permanent identity into a state-owned commercial bank in Cambodia with the features of a Public Economic Enterprise and with the intention of conducting autonomous business              operations. 

In January 2001, the Bank obtained its banking license from the Central Bank to operate as a commercial bank in the Kingdom of Cambodia for a period of      three years starting from 4 January 2001. This was the first license granted to enable the Bank to operate as a separate legal entity independent from the Central Bank's direct management. On 8 January 2004, the Bank obtained its 2nd banking license from the Central Bank for a period of three years starting    from that date. The Bank now holds a commercial banking license, which was renewed for an indefinite period, on 21 December 2006

On 31 December 2002, the Ministry of Economy and Finance ("MEF") announced, through a Statement of Intent, the privatisation of the Bank as part of the   reform of the financial sector of the Royal Government of Cambodia. On 28 October 2005 the shareholders of the Bank, represented by the Privatisation   Committee, entered into a sales agreement with Canadia Bank and ING Holding Company. The Central Bank sold its 20% shareholding in the Bank and MEF   reduced its 80% shareholding to 10%. In 2009, in accordance with the recommendation of the Central Bank, Canadia Bank reduced its shares from 48% to  15.22% and 2 new private shareholders having respectively a share of 15.39%, entered the capital of FTB. The Bank's Memorandum and Articles of

Job Description:
This role is responsible for servicing the clients who come to the branch counter. The incumbent will build a thorough understanding of each client financial requirements and will focus on providing best services to retain and build deeper relationships with clients.

Main Duties

•	Process banking transaction for the customers following FTB service standards
•	Act as a key advocate to existing and potential customers
•	Proactively determine customer’s need to actively sell the bank’s full range of product and services
•	Keep update on product knowledge and policies
•	Ensure transactional processing is efficient and accurate 
•	Assist others where needed
Job Requirement:
Skills/ Experiences

•	Bachelor Degree in Banking or related field
•	One year experience in customer service, cashier/teller with banking/MFIs 
•	Strong customer service and sales-oriented personality
•	Good organizational and time management skills
•	A strong desire to work in a team 
•	English language proficiency, Chinese language is a plus
•	Computer literacy in Microsoft Office Word & Excel
How to Apply:
Interested applicants, please send by email attached with a cover letter and your most updated CV (with current photo) to: hr@ftbbank.com or submit the hard copy at Our Head Office, Building No. 33 C-D, Tchecoslovaquie Blvd(169), Sangkat Veal Vong, Khan 7Makara Phnom Penh. Only short-listed candidates will be contacted for interview.
Please visit our website: http://www.ftbbank.com/vacant-and-career for more available vacancy

Job Description:
Learn and understand lending fundamentals and the Bank’s lending products and process
Assist credit officers to perform credit analysis in accordance with the Bank’s policies
Begin to conduct credit analysis with the support from assigned credit officers
Help prepare a loan contract and other related documents
Assist to prepare irregular or ongoing credit reports
Work closely with both credit officer and credit administration officers
Join customer meeting and visit with credit officers
Prepare and update customers’ filing in accordance with the required checklist
Conduct information research on industry or sectors
Help promote the Bank’s products and profile
Complete reports and other tasks as assigned by the department
Job Requirement:
Fresh graduate and fourth-year student in Finance, Banking, Accounting, Law, or related fields
Good time management, organizational and communication skills
Self-starter and highly motivated
Attention to details and a high degree of responsibilities
Ability work effectively in a team environment with credit officers and credit administration officers
Sound written and verbal English skills
Computer Skills (Ms. Word, Excel) with proficient Khmer typing skill

Job Description:
 Support and Fix all the transaction issues from all channels (MOBILE/Wing/Bill payment/mVISA…)
 Support mobile end users.
 Upload customer number into Biller Server.
 Create mBanking users' back office
 Monitoring all transactions from Mobile apps ensure service running 24/7.
 Support back office mBanking System.
 Maintenance mobile banking system.
 Dealing with vendor to fix mobile banking System and transaction issues.
 Dealing with vendor implement project.
 Deploy patch for fix or Change Request to Production.
 Generated Monthly Report for Digital Department
 Perform other tasks assigned by supervisors.
Job Requirement:
 Bachelor Degree of IT or related field
 At least two years’ experience related to the said position
 Good knowledge and understanding of electronic banking and banking products and services
 Good organizational and time management skills
 A strong desire to work in a team oriented
 Critical thinker and problem-solving skills
 Computer literacy and English language proficiency.

Job Description:
 Accountable for ATM fixing and services monitoring to maximize uptime e.g. fast tracking end to end resolution on ATM and the peripherals issue e.g. receipt rolls, Journal rolls, UPS.
 Keep monitoring ATM performance (Hardware/Software/ATM Network).
 Install new ATM at ATM Side.
 Onside and off side fixing ATM issues (Hardware / Software).
 Onside support with Branch and Operation team.
 Repair ATM spare part for re-use
 ATM Machines and Spare Parts stock management.
 Provide the ATM journal log and transaction images to Accounting Reconcile team.
 Backup all ATM logs and transaction images.
 Prepare Monthly ATM performance report and report to Managements and relevant teams.
 Perform other tasks assigned by supervisors.
Job Requirement:
 Bachelor Degree of IT or related field
 At least two years’ experience related to the said position
 Good knowledge and understanding of ATM, Electronic Banking and banking products and services
 Good organizational and time management skills
 A strong desire to work in a team oriented
 High initiative, commitment, good communication and problem solving skills.
 Computer literacy and English language proficiency.

Company Profile:
From a very humble beginning as a small roofing sheet roll former in 1997, ISI STEEL, A member of ISI GROUP, has successfully transformed itself from a family-run business into a midsize corporation leading Cambodia's steel processing industry. With modern processing facilities, world-class management systems and technology, dedicated staff and nationwide distribution networks serving our customers nationwide, ISI STEEL has become a truly reliable and respectable local brand synonymous with quality roofing and wall cladding systems and structural steel products.

This would not have been possible without the strong support of our customers, local and international business partners, our staff's dedication and hard work, and last but not least the government efforts for maintaining the political stability and sustainable economic growth. To ensure our company’s sustainable development and industry-leading position, we are committed to further invest in upgrading our manufacturing facilities, expanding our distribution network, building up our human capital, technology infrastructure, and product innovations to better meet our customer's need and expectation.

While continuing to strengthen our core capabilities in the manufacturing and distribution of quality coated steel products, we have over the years ventured into a number of related diversifications such as pre-engineering steel building fabrication, property development including industrial park, residential, offices and resorts developments, and other construction materials trading business through our subsidiary and affiliated companies to capture the opportunities in the growing economy of Cambodia.

- Manage the country's filing of cases/lawsuits and interactions with external legal counsels to facilitate efficient management of litigations/arbitrations

Job Description:
** Responsibilities:
This position reports to the Vice President, Indochina and Group Chief Growth Officer is responsible for the effective management of marketing programs in Cambodia.
- Develop and execute multi-year strategic plan as well as annual marketing program to deliver growth
- Develop and execute Trade Marketing Strategy to achieve defined business objectives across all product categories by putting in place, monitor and improve processes to link all Marketing activities with the activities of the Sales team
- Lead and support in the strategic development, implementation and optimization of digital marketing campaigns, including media planning and reporting / analytics and launch activities and integrated campaign aligned with brand strategy across various digital channel activations
- Steering of agencies both creative & media to conduct project on-time
- Flawlessly implement and execute marketing strategies to support business objectives.
- Synthesize consumer insights and secondary market research to inform and optimize plans.
- Lead price pack category architecture within the channel, launching new SKU’s that better meet customer/consumer requirements and deliver against key internal financial KPIs.
- Lead communication to enhance brand awareness and likeability in digital platform.
- Develop understanding of key customers to implement annual promotional plan and marketing programs that will increase visibility and drive velocity within end consumers.
- Design and develop trade marketing program to support seasonal promotions, new product and program launches, and innovative marketing initiatives to drive volume and relationships/favorability with distributors.
- Ongoing management of product portfolio within the channel to ensure optimal assortment that delivers
- Execute POS materials and signage, sales collateral and sales presentations, ensuring adherence to all brand guidelines.
- SKU-level profitability. Includes partnership with sales managers and marketing associates to launch relevant innovation of Yeo’s products channel.
- Develop innovative programs and pitch partnerships to incubate new products and drive total brand awareness in an effort to support retail business.
- Collaborate with sales to foster relationships with distributors and/or key customers, ensuring that we are bringing forward relevant solutions and position products as an innovator and thought leader.
- Lead tradeshow strategy and execution ensuring that Yeo’s products are present & visible at key industry shows.
- Collaborate with finance co-pilot and sales teams to deliver a holistic pricing and promotion strategy that to deliver sustainable profitable growth.
- Partner with finance co-pilot and field sales analyst to develop ongoing reporting against plan KPIs. Integrate insights into monthly business meetings.
- Track and report competitive activities and product offerings.
- Provide administration support for marketing reports and submissions to finance department.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s degree required, MBA preferred.
- 5-7+ years of experience in marketing, trade marketing, brand management, or product management
- Experience in working closely with and/or leading sales teams is desired.
- Experience in consulting, channel marketing and/or B2B marketing is useful.
- Relevant social media management, digital marketing, on line community management experience is preferred
- Strong analytical and product management skills; comfortable with syndicated data as well disparate data/comfort with ambiguity and/or limited data.
- Strong knowledge of marketing vehicles and fundamentals.
- Ability to analyze business trends and financial metrics, including sales, return on investments, and profit and loss.

** If you are interested, please send your CV to hrkh@yeos.com or YHS (Cambodia) Food & Beverage Pte Ltd, Phnom Penh Special Economic Zone, National Road #4, 
Phum Tachet, Sangkat Beung Thom, Khan Kambol, Phnom Penh.

Company Profile:
A Singapore Brand, A Global Business 

With a corporate history that extends more than a hundred years, Yeo’s (also known as YHS or Yeo Hiap Seng) has grown from strength to strength, from its humble beginnings as a striving enterprise in pre-war Singapore, to its transformation as a food & beverage conglomerate with a global network that spans Asia-Pacific, Europe, North America and Oceanic regions. 

A category leader in the Asian drinks market, Yeo’s has broadened its customer reach and entrenched its industry presence through a combination of geographical expansion and product diversification. On the beverage business front, Yeo’s competitive advantage lies in the Group’s ability to stay true and current to consumers’ changing palettes and individual preferences based on lifestyle and cultural differences. 

With a century of heritage, the Yeo's brand bears the hallmark of superior product quality. Yeos is committed to meeting evolving consumer needs and growing market demands through continued product innovation. 

We are honored to have won following awards in the recent two years: 
2017 Singapore Prestige Brand Award - Most Popular Regional Brand Overall Winner; 
2017 Singapore Prestige Brand Award - Regional Brands; 
2018 The Brand Laureate World Halal Brand Award 2018 - Best Brands in FMCG - Food & Beverage.

job title: Assistant Manager, Safety, Environmental, and Security (EHS)
position: Assistant Manager, Safety, Environmental, and Security (EHS)
Job Description:
** Job Summary:
The Assistant Manager, EHS is responsible for Designing, seeking approval of and ensuring execution of required occupational safety, health, environmental, sustainability and related management system programs and processes. 

** Responsibilities:
- Responsible for implementing and managing Behavior-Based Safety programs, Regulatory training, environmental waste reduction and EHS Program Management to maintain and enhance
Certification standards, as well as continuous improvement of key performance metrics through project management and initiatives.
- Facilitate Risk Assessment Process (Health & Safety Risks, Environmental Aspects and Impacts) in order to mitigate risks. Coordinate with team and functional management, including HR, to manage injured workers including return to work programs.
- Conduct or respond to health and safety assessments/
analyses in plant to minimize health and safety risks
- Lead the implementation of the facilities wastewater quality strategy compliance tracking and review/approval of designs.
- Design and deliver EHS procedure and management system related training modules at five levels: New Hire Orientation, Annual Review, Specialty, Contractor, and Management
- Develop implementation strategies, implement, evaluate and/or certify effective implementation of programs and standards.
- Establish and maintain medical response program and emergency response organization and champion sustainability efforts within the facility.
- Coordinate and communicate findings of internal and external audits to management staff, and ensure items of non-conformance are addressed and corrected according to schedule
- Effectively translate safety and sustainability goals and objectives to all levels of the organization ensuring alignment on relevant performance data
- Routinely review safety and sustainability results with plant personnel to maximize facility performance.
- Foster an environment that supports an engaged safety and sustainability culture.
- Participate in industry organizations to stay current on technologies, process and regulations
- Seek, share and adopt ideas and best practices in and outside the Company and embrace change introduced by others
- Design, implement and execute programs and processes to protect the safety and health of employees
- Ensure facility compliance with good environmental practices and with applicable regulations.
- Establish and maintain appropriate relationships with state and local regulatory agencies. Represent company on regulatory issues with impact outside local plant.

** Requirements
* Knowledge-
- Safety: Knowledge of technical practices and programs used in the reduction or elimination of workplace hazards. Includes knowledge of worker safety regulations as they relate to the manufacturing, distribution, and sales.
- Environmental Management System Design: Ability to design, develop and implement effective environmental management systems. This includes the ability to coach Associates how to effectively assess environmental management system designs and deployment.
- Environmental and Health & Safety Regulations: Knowledge of government environmental, health and safety regulations; how to access and evaluate resources as applicable to facilities within YHS Cambodia.
- Industrial Hygiene: Knowledge of procedures used to anticipate, recognize, evaluate and control physical, chemical, biological and ergonomic hazards.
- Technical Communication to Non-Technical Audience: Ability to break down or modify complex technical information as needed to communicate it orally or in writing to non-technical staff (e.g., senior managers, customers or consumers). This includes the ability to use analogies/metaphors understood by the target audience to reinforce points. It also includes the ability to accurately read the audience’s level of understanding and adjust the message/presentation to deliver it at the appropriate level.
Job Requirement:
** Requirements- Necessary Technical:
- 5-7 years’ Experience of heading safety at a manufacturing operations of 100 or more people.
- Degree in Environmental engineering or management or EHS programs is desirable.
- Knowledge of technical practices and programs used in identification and elimination of workplace hazards
- Knowledge of worker safety regulations as they relate to manufacturing.
- Knowledge of procedures used to anticipate, recognize, evaluate and control physical, chemical, biological and ergonomic hazards.
- Ability to interact with government officials; Seek required safety and environment related certifications
- Capability to Train and educate people on occupational health and Safety requirements at plant.
- Ability to bring in a culture of safety to all in the operations
- Trained on handling emergency response

** Requirements - Preferred:
- Lean, Six Sigma experience
- Food or beverage manufacturing experience
- Expert in industrial hygiene
- Expert in environmental systems and regulations

** If you are interested, please send your CV to hrkh@yeos.com or YHS (Cambodia) Food & Beverage Pte Ltd, Phnom Penh Special Economic Zone, National Road #4, 
Phum Tachet, Sangkat Beung Thom, Khan Kambol, Phnom Penh.

Job Description:
- Ensure all production equipment is operating reliably and Overall Equipment Efficiency measures are achievable during production shifts in food & beverage manufacturing plant.
- Maintains equipment to all specifications relating to electrical, instrumentation, mechanical, and troubleshooting in a team operation such as gear boxes, pumps, bearings, conveyors, valves, hydraulic machines, sensors, gauges, RTD’s, pressure transmitters, flow meters and all other type of rotary and stationary equipment
- Performs scheduled and unscheduled service activities including emergency service, preventative maintenance and installations
- Provide the Engineering or Maintenance Team with support in the implementation of production line modifications.
- Provide the Maintenance Team with support in the troubleshooting and repair of equipment or instrumentation operating under the control of an automated system.
- Willing to work on shift and participate in & On Call & service including after hours and weekend
schedule rotation
- Maintain spare part levels and trigger to reorders within replenishment guidelines
- Ensure compliance with company and legislative Health, Safety, Environment, quality & food safety and housekeeping procedures.
- Maintenance of a safe operating environment within the complex and surrounding areas
Job Requirement:
- Degree, Diploma in Electrical/Instrumentation/Mechanical field
- 2-3 years previous relevant experience in similar manufacturing environment. Good knowledge & experience of electrical, instrumentation & control such as Profibus system will be an added advantage
- Knowledge in GMP, food safety and hygienic design standard
- Good physical fitness to be able to perform shift duties & hands on mechanical and electrical maintenance work is essential
- Applicants must have good communication skills combined with a flexible, team orientated and ‘can do’ approach
- Computer literate, able to read & comprehend mechanical and electrical drawings, P&IDs specifications is required
- Experience of plant start up, commissioning would be preferable
- Boiler operation certification.

Company Profile:
A Singapore Brand, A Global Business 

With a corporate history that extends more than a hundred years, Yeo’s (also known as YHS or Yeo Hiap Seng) has grown from strength to strength, from its humble beginnings as a striving enterprise in pre-war Singapore, to its transformation as a food & beverage conglomerate with a global network that spans Asia-Pacific, Europe, North America and Oceanic regions. 

A category leader in the Asian drinks market, Yeo’s has broadened its customer reach and entrenched its industry presence through a combination of geographical expansion and product diversification. On the beverage business front, Yeo’s competitive advantage lies in the Group’s ability to stay true and current to consumers’ changing palettes and individual preferences based on lifestyle and cultural differences. 

With a century of heritage, the Yeo's brand bears the hallmark of superior product quality. Yeos is committed to meeting evolving consumer needs and growing market demands through continued product innovation. 

We are honored to have won following awards in the recent two years: 
2017 Singapore Prestige Brand Award - Most Popular Regional Brand Overall Winner; 
2017 Singapore Prestige Brand Award - Regional Brands; 
2018 The Brand Laureate World Halal Brand Award 2018 - Best Brands in FMCG - Food & Beverage.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR & Admin   023 989 181 hrkh@yeos.com Phnom Penh Special Economic Zone, National Road #4,  Phum Tachet, Sangkat Beung Thom, Khan Kambol, Phnom Penh 023 989 181

Job Description:
- Plan and implement preventive maintenance and overhaul for process, filling and packing equipment.
- Monitor and keep track of maintenance and repair activities being carried out.
- Supervise and control daily site activities to ensure contractors or suppliers perform and complete works in a safe and timely manner without compromising work quality.
- Able to issue reports for management on issues occurred and resolved. E.g corrective action report and preventive action report.
- Organise equipment spare parts, tools, equipment O&M (Operation and Maintenance) manuals and equipment drawings.
- Good analytical skills, able to use fishbone analysis to find out root; uses Poka-yoke to improve safety, efficiency and reliability of the production equipment.
- Continuously improving the maintenance processes and framework to achieve operational excellence.
- Able to carry training for technician staff
- Willing to stay late to resolve equipment problems in the event of equipment problems cause production down.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s Degree in mechanical and electrical engineering from a recognised university or polytechnic or equivalent qualification.
- Minimum 3 to 5 years of working experience in food manufacturing.
- Hand-on experience on troubleshooting and repair food industry equipment's and components. E.g Pumps, valves, instruments and automation components.
- Able to interpret P&I (Piping and Instrumentation) drawing, single line diagram and Mechanical drawing.
- Good knowledge in thermodynamics & fluid mechanics.
- Good knowledge in PLC (Programmable Control Logic) and automation.
- Good verbal and written English communication skills
- Proficient in MS office applications
- Able to use AUTOcad software to generate engineering drawings
