Job Description:
- Work with Recruitment Team in order to source, screen and interview candidates and ensure on time recruitment /replacement of staffs
- Facilitate interview process between candidates and clients
- Collect relevant recruitment documents with approval from clients and pass to Payroll & Compliance Team (CVs, Interview Form, and Reference Check)
- Conduct New staff orientation prior starting work
- Coordinate New Staff with clients for onboard and plan
- Timely notify clients about staff’s probation due date and closely follow up to ensue probation evaluation is completed before the due date with sufficient supporting documents
- To ensure probation confirmation informed to Payroll & Compliance on time
- Review and ensure all leave requests, OT, and Attendance forms are completed correctly according to the policy. Ensure all supporting document for payroll processing submitted to Payroll & Compliance on time
- Review and calculate Travel Allowances and ensure the reimbursement amount is followed policy
- Review staff claim documents and ensure the claim is aligned with Policy
- Field supervision, evaluation and co-ordination to ensure discipline, organized and effective operation.
- Conduct exit interview with leavers
- Exercise appropriate control to keep: (i) the staff turnover to minimum; and (ii) the leave of absence of staff to minimum.
- Work closely with HRBP in order to produce effective recommendation for staff
deployment and retention.
 Build good relationship with client’s management team and staff to maximize corporation.
- Ensure staff understand and briefed about their roles and responsibilities prior on boarding.
- Ensure staff have appropriate knowledge, skills and attitude (KSA) to enable and facilitate the successful plan of clients.
- Coordinate staff to attend training as required.
- Ensure staff comply with ODI/client’s procedures, policies and guidelines governing health and safety, confidentiality, codes of ethics, rules of conduct, conditions of work, access to and use of client’s offices and facilities and any other policies and procedures applied to client’s personnel and consultants.
- Ensure all staff are provided with working procedures or manuals and equipment in good condition as agreed/requested by client
- Solving any staff complaint
- Perform other tasks as required from time to time.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration or any other related fields
- At least 2 years of HR experience in managing and coordinating project works
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills
- Good leadership and management skills
- Good Problem-solving and decision-making skills
- Result-oriented and ability to work independently
- Ability to work well under pressure
- Able to travel to any provinces

Company Profile:
Starting from 1951 in Texas, United States, Circle K is now one of  the most widely recognized convenience store brands, known worldwide for  quality products & great customer service with more than 15.000  associates worldwide including Hong Kong, China, Vietnam, Indonesia,  UAE, Macau, Mexico, Honduras, Guam, Malaysia, The Philippines, Egypt  & Costa Rica…

At Circle K Cambodia, our mission is to be the best and most convenient place for all of your daily shopping needs.

Vision
To be the leading No 1 Neighborhood Convenience Store in Cambodia providing 24 hours conveniences, exclusive merchandise and value added services to our customers.

Mission
To Make Our Customer Life’s a Little Easier Everyday

Core Value
1- Customer Focus: Customer are the reason for our success in Business and we are committed to listen and respond positively to their need.
2- Integrity: Honest, Trustworthy, Adhere to Strong Moral and Ethical Principle and Value.
3- Teamwork: one team, one goal and one direction – with collaboration, share and support each other.
4- Accountability: taking ownership for a task or role and committed to execute and deliver result.
5- Courtesy & Respect: treating other people the way you want to be treated.
6- Continuous Growth: Proactive to Adapt to Instance change.
7- Excellent: Aim for higher quality and accuracy, usually above performance standard.

Currently Circle K Cambodia is having more than 35 Store locate in the following:
- Phnnom Penh
- Siem Reap
Contact Info: Contact Information Recruitment Team  095 888 639 hr@circlekcambodia.com CITY TOWER BUILDING No.321,Mao Tse Toung Blvd., 338 UNIT 1A, Sangkat Phsar Depot I, Khan Toul Kork, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 095 888 639

Job Description:
1- Payroll Executive
o Gather information on hours worked for each employee using a certain devise (Finger Scan, Time Attendant etc.)
o Working with C & B Manager for employee movement or transfer or salary adjustment.
o Receive approval from upper management for payments when needed
o Prepare and execute pay orders through an electronic system or distribute paychecks
o Administer statements of payment to personnel either electronically or on paper
o Process taxes and payment of employee benefits
o Hiring people into HRIS system and ensure time attendant is register
o Keep track of hour rates, wages, compensation benefit rates, new hire information etc.
o Address issues and questions regarding payroll from employees and superiors
o Prepare reports for upper management, finance department etc.

2- Compliance Executive
o Educate employees about all regulatory and legal requirements that can affect your organization.
o Create an employee handbook and update it regularly.
o Dealing regularly with Inspector from Ministry
o Periodically report to ministry in regard to compliances either new or existing, for instance, OT request, NSSF, Employee Movement, Apprentice, Work Permitted & Quota for expat working within the company, Shop Steward arrangement, Occupational Safety & Health (OSH), Union, Health Check, Employment Work Book.
o Disciplinary investigation and implementation etc.
o Counsel with employees and management concerning leave requests and provide employees with accurate information relating to absences, medical certification requirements, return to work dates, short term disability, military leave and bereavement time, etc.
Job Requirement:
1- Payroll Executive
o Proven experience as payroll Officer, Executive or payroll related duties
o Solid understanding of accounting fundamentals and payroll best practices
o Very good knowledge of legislation and regulations of the field
o Proficient in MS Office and good knowledge of relevant software (e.g. Kronos, Payforce) and databases
o Trustworthy with attention to confidentiality
o Outstanding organizational ability with great attention to detail
o Excellent communication skills
o BSc/BA in business, accounting or relevant field is a plus

2- Compliance Executive
o Education: Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources or Business Administration, or in a related field
o Knowledge: it is important that they have hands-on experience in the application of compliance policies and procedures; solid understanding of employment laws and regulations and demonstrated research abilities in creating and delivering presentations to HR professionals. Employers are also interested in individuals with proven ability to design processes and programs that align with the operations of the business
o Communication skills: to provide training and guidance to employees on compliance-related issues. Therefore, it is important that applicants can convey information both verbally and in writing to employees, senior-level HR professionals, and other stakeholders
o Computer skills: should be proficient with HR information systems (PeopleSoft), Microsoft Excel, and other MS Office programs (Outlook, Word, Access, PowerPoint), and other packages necessary for analyzing data to support decision making
o Organizational skills: interfaces with applicants, employees, and external agents. So, they must be able to program their tasks and effectively prioritize assignments to handle the multiple tasks associated with the job position
o Interpersonal skills: Applicants for the position should be able to build rapport, establish relationships, influence and partner with people across all levels

job title: Finance Intern (1 position in Phnom Penh)
position: Finance Intern (1 position in Phnom Penh)
Job Description:
* The Opportunity 
The customer is the focus of everything we do, and millions of end users rely on our products daily. We believe in the value of empowering Intern Finance with the resources to solve critical problems for the future of our business, which is why we need you. 

Manulife Contact Center is looking for individuals genuinely excited to help our customers. They will engage and connect with clients across the United States and Canada to provide product and services information and help resolve emerging concerns.

We are committed to be an equal opportunity employer and welcome applications from all suitably qualified persons regardless of their race, sex, disability, religion/belief, sexual orientation or age”. 
To support the business growth in Cambodia, we are looking for dynamic and result-oriented individuals to fill in the position of:

* What motivates you? 
• You obsess about customers, listen, engage and act for their benefit 
• You think big, with curiosity to discover ways to use your agile mindset and enable business outcomes 
• You thrive in teams, and enjoy getting things done together
• You take ownership and build solutions, focusing on what matters 
• You do what is right, work with integrity and speak up
• You share your humanity, helping us build a diverse and inclusive work environment for everyone
Job Requirement:
* We are looking for someone with: 
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills 
• Excellent analytical, problem solving and solutioning skills 
• A capacity for constant learning from both success and failure 
• Open to change and continuous improvement 

* Nice to Haves:  
• Applicants should be Business, Finance, or Accounting majors 
• Basic knowledge in Accounting and Operation systems. 
• Proficient in Microsoft Excel, Word is required. 

* On the job you will: 
• Assist in payment and collection process 
• Assist in booking transaction in finance system  
• Assist in month end closing

* Our commitment to you 
• Our mission; to be a part of making Decisions Easier and Lives Better
• A leadership team dedicated to your growth and success 
• A bold ambition and set of goals to be a leader in driving transformation in our industry 
• Our best. Every day. 

Learn more about opportunities with us at jobs.manulife.com. Join us now! 

 Click here for detail :
Company Profile: Manulife is a leading Canada-based financial services group with principal operations in Asia, Canada and the United States. Clients look to Manulife for strong, reliable, trustworthy and forward-thinking solutions for their most significant financial decisions. Our international network of employees, agents and distribution partners offers financial protection and wealth management products and services to millions of clients. We also provide asset management services to institutional customers. At the end of June 2016, we had US$718 billion in assets under management and administration, and in the previous 12 months we made more than US25.4 billion in benefits, interest and other payments to our customers. Our group of companies operates as Manulife in Canada and Asia and primarily as John Hancock in the United States. Manulife Financial Corporation trades as 'MFC' on the TSX, NYSE and PSE, and under '945' on the SEHK. We are committed to be an equal opportunity employer and welcome applications from all suitably qualified persons regardless of their race, sex, disability, religion/belief, sexual orientation or age”.
Contact Info: Contact Information Talents Acquisition team  096 720 46 53 sophornchealin_nat@manulife.com 104 Russian Federation Blvd | Phnom Penh, Phnom Penh 096 720 46 53

Job Description:
Main responsibilities:
1. Take mission and follow the schedule Job Order that assigned by Supervisor/ Manager both at field or workshop and solve customer complaints.
2. Wearing the security work uniform such as helmet, security shoe, uniform etc. Clean the workplace before finish with 5’s standard.
3. Communicate with customers through all channels to fix customers’ issues
4. Assemble machinery or truck components according to specifications.
5. Conduct Arrival Inspection to the machine after assembly or production order, ensure that machine is pass the quality and ready for sale.
6. Conduct Pre-Delivery Inspection to the machine assisted, ensure the quality of machine pass the PDI are good and ready for use.
7. Meet with clients better understand their concerns and identify the issue.
8. Examine machines and oversee diagnostic tests to determine functionality problems.
9. Maintain work logs, repairs, and maintenance records.
10. Perform machinery or truck assessments and alert customers on issues that will prohibit their machinery or truck from passing inspection.
11. Troubleshooting the problem; customer complaint, replace parts and repair the problem found
12. Explain the problem and solution to customer and prepare service report for customer signe after service activity provided.
13. Communicate and report the problem found to supervisor/ manager in case cannot solve the problem.
14. Prepare daily report both pictures; txt and verbal to Supervisor/ Manager.
15. Share knowledge and experience to mechanic.
16. Join training and continuous improvement on both soft skills and hard skills.
17. Other tasks assigned by manager and head of department
Job Requirement:
Minimum Requirements:

1. Minimum 2 to 3 years of experiences and skills in mechanics and related field
2. Bachelor of mechanical or electrical skills
3. Medium English level in both written and spoken
4. Sense of leadership
5. High responsibility
6. Ability to work under pressure
7. Good analytical and logical reasoning skills
8. Good interpersonal skills

Job Description:

1. Obtain and compile copies of credit applicants' credit histories, corporate financial statements, and other financial information

3. Strong analytical and logical reasoning skills
4. Skill on Ms. Office
5. Strong interpersonal skills
6. Ability to work under pressure
7. Strong presentation, written communications, and report-writing skills in English and Khmer

Job Description:
1. Responsibility: Control quality of products from suppliers, production process, production activities, packaging, delivery process
2. Job Duty:
- Control quality of inputs from suppliers
- Control production process from quality points of view and promptly analyze the root causes
- Define controlled and verification quality items of finished goods
- Inspect and test the quality of products after defined items
- Control quality of packaging and delivery status
- Assure product qualities with customers
- Confirm customers work if there is any impacts to our products
- Prepare quality documents to get approval from customers
- Respond to customers' requests, including customer's audit
- Hold quality meeting to get delivery approval
- Analysis quality of part/product about in-line defect, customer claim.
Job Requirement:
- Age: 20 ~ 30
- Sex: Male
- Bachelor degree in Engineering in field mechanics, electronic, electricity or automotive, or relevant field.
- Primary mathematics ability
- Basic PC skill (Excel, word, Power Point)
- English communication
- Open mind & team work mind
- Good problem analysis skill (QC tools is must, statistic method is wanted)
- Understand basic measurement method (Vernier and micro-meter is must. Precise measurement; e.g. Coordinate and shape measuring are wanted)

Job Description: Human Resource•	Manage the recruitment and selection process•	Advice, guide line-manager for the workforce planning•	Maintain the work structure by updating job requirements and job descriptions for all positions•	Develop salary range by conducting wage surveys within labor market and conducting job evaluations; and implementing pay structure revisions•	Review employee benefits programs across the organization•	Oversee and manage yearly performance appraisal that drives high performance•	Assess training needs to apply and monitor training programs•	Conduct employee orientation and training programs•	Provide consultation to the manager related to employee relations issues, and managing all disciplinary issues within the company•	Maintain historical human resource and company records by designing a filing and retrieval system; keeping past and current records•	Develop company regulation, policy, and procedure•	Deal with Labor Inspector regarding labor law compliance.Administration•	Manage on tenders process and payment process•	Manage hygiene of the company through supervising cleaners to clean all areas in the company premise•	Monitor the vehicles and motorbike of company to make sure all of them are in good condition•	Work with Ministry of Labor to request for quota of usage of foreign employees•	Fixed asset and office management•	Other tasks assigned by General Manager.
Job Requirement: •	Master/Bachelor degree in human resource, business administration or related field.•	Minimum 5 years’ experience in related field•	Good knowledge of labor law•	Good in Spoken and Written English•	Computer literacy (Word, Excel, PowerPoint…)•	Team and goal-orientated; good attitude and inter-personal skills•	Sound judgment and good at problem solving;•	Strong Management and leadership skills•	Be creative, initiative and good at multitasking.
Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.
Contact Info: Contact Information Human Resources Department  010222019 / 017999255 jobs@villagephnompenh.com #1159 National Road No. 2 Phum Preaek Ta Nu, Sangkat Chak Angrae Leu, Khan Mean Chey, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 010222019 / 017999255

position: 施工员、技术员、资料员、质量员、安全员
Job Description: 场道工程人员招聘信息此次主要拟聘岗位：施工员、技术员、资料员、质量员、安全员。施工员:岗位要求：1、负责工程施工现场的施工协调、安全、质量、环境、进度等管理。2、负责施工现场管理，有序地组织平面、立体的各种材料和设备的运输、堆放工作，协调工程进度，确认安全文明措施，监控关键施工过程的实施。贯彻实施项目职业健康、安全与环境管理目标及方案。3、严格执行施工规范和验收标准，指导各专业班组按图纸设计要求进行施工；4、负责编制现场人工、材料、机具实际用量计划，并对使用情况进行监督、检查及调整。5、参与各专业队伍的施工协调工作，组织完成工序交接及专业交接。6、参与项目质量、安全文明、进度的监督检查管理工作，并每日填写施工日志。7、根据总进度要求，根据图纸提前提出物资需求计划，到场材料合理使用，做好项目材料用量管控。8、配合工程技术质量管理工作，做好施工资料的过程积累。完成施工过程图片、音像资料的摄取、收集与整理工作。9、负责工程变更签证，收集工程变更签证及索赔证据。10、工程管理部门是施工现场的管理者，各施工工序的主导者，在进行各项验收检查时，由工程部门提供相应的协助。11、施工现场有需监督检查重要工序时，落实好人员管理，做到现场安全、质量等可控。12、负责交工计划编制，组织项目实物交工、竣工验收及遗留问题的处理工作。13、参与项目结构验收与竣工验收工作，参与竣工资料编制和项目竣工图的绘制工作。技术员:岗位要求：1、协助技术主管编写项目施工方案、工艺标准以及施工工艺、施工技术措施、质量保证措施等。2、熟悉施工图设计文件，填写《工程项目图纸会审记录》，提交图纸会审或设计联络单。3、参与对项目管理人员和作业队伍管理人员进行技术交底，填写《质量技术交底记录》。4、协助技术主管落实对危险性较大的分部分项工程中所采用的技术施。5、协助技术主管对重要的关键部位或影响全工程的技术对象进行复核,以避免发生重大差错而影响工程的质量和使用。6、配合技术主管解决施工过程出现的技术问题，并根据需要办理设计联络单、变更单。7、参与质量事故分析，提出事故处理方案，并跟踪方案。8、对质量问题有提出预防和纠正措施的责任。9、根据交工文件编制要求，在规定的时间节点内配合资料员完成交工验收技术资料的收集、整理的工作。资料员：岗位要求：1、负责项目部相关记录的收集、编目、整理、保管、传阅，确保记录的可靠性、完整性、满足可追溯性要求；2、负责工程项目的所有图纸的接收、清点、登记、发放、归档、管理工作；3、了解并执行工程所在地工程档案资料管理规定，明确形成资料的种类及格式等要求，并向相关资料形成人员进行交底；4、监督检查施工过程资料的编制，主动收集过程资料，做到完整、及时，与工程进度同步，保证资料的真实、完整及有效；5、负责施工技术质量资料、竣工资料等的归档工作；6、负责项目施工过程中日常文件收发、传递工作。质量员：岗位要求：1、协助技术主管依据合同约定完成质量策划、建立质量管理体系、完成工程项目划分；2、参与分包方、分供方（工程材料、周转材料、半成品等）的质量保证能力的评价；3、参加对项目管理人员和作业队伍管理人员进行的技术交底并提出有关质量管理要求；4、提出质量检查、检验所需设施（检验工器具、养生房等）等计划，并对其有效性予以确认；5、根据质量计划、施工组织设计的要求，对质量管理活动过程和作业人员工艺执行情况进行监督检查；6、审核各类工程材料、半成品等质保资料及复检资料；7、负责工序质量和工序交接的确认，督促、实施质量技术措施，严格操作过程的质量监控，做好工程质量的检查和检验批验收工作。8、对已完成的分部分项工程做好分阶段上报工作，参与分部分项的验收。9、负责项目部不合格品信息的建账登记、原因分析及制定纠正措施；10、负责项目部工程质量信息的收集、整理工作，经项目主管审核后上报公司职能部门；11、负责办理各分部分项及单位工程的质量验收报验手续，确保质量验收资料的完整、准确。安全员:岗位要求：1、负责开展项目安全管理工作，对工程项目安全生产管理体系的有效运行负直接管理责任。2、负责施工现场安全生产日常检查并做好检查记录，组织实施项目安全监督，对检查中发现问题和隐患及时解决。组织建立完善项目安全管理资料，组织项目安全考评。3、组织实施项目安全生产教育培训；参加各类安全教育培训活动及安全技术交底工作。监督员工持证上岗、班前安全活动开展。对新进场人员开展入场安全教育，并将教育记录归档。4、参加现场机械设备、用电设施、安全防护设施和消防设施的验收。5、参与项目安全策划的编制，对落实情况进行监督。6、负责现场监督危险性较大工程安全专项施工方案实施情况；负责对方案管理流程安全监督；组织落实重大危险源安全管控。对施工现场存在的安全隐患有权责令立即整改；对于发现的重大安全隐患，有权向企业安全生产管理机构报告。7、组织召开项目安全生产会议；组织项目开展安全生产标准化。监督项目安全生产费用落实。8、组织制定项目生产安全事故应急救援预案；负责实施项目生产安全事故应急救援预案。9、发生事故后按照规定及时上报事故情况，保护现场，参与事故的调查处理；10、对工作过程中留下的轨迹认真记录，建立完善的安全管理台帐，按时上报有关资料和报表；
Job Requirement: 施工员:任职要求：1、大专以上学历，机场场道、市政及道路与桥梁相关专业优先；2、年龄25岁以上，三年以上同岗位工作经验，熟悉施工工序；或（三年以上工程现场管理工作经验，有同岗位工作经验者优先；）3、具备较强的组织协调能力、统筹计划和抗压能力，工作认真，吃苦耐劳；4、持有新八大员证件者优先。5、熟悉土建类施工图、掌握工程量计算及会CAD简易制图。三、工作地点：柬埔寨金边市技术员：任职要求：1、大专以上学历，机场场道、市政及道路与桥梁相关专业优先；2、三年以上有同岗位工作经验者优先；3、熟悉国家相关政策法规，具备与岗位所需的相关专业知识，熟练使用办公软件和CAD制图软件，具有核算统计技能；4、具有很强的责任心和事业心，工作认真，吃苦耐劳；三、工作地点：柬埔寨金边市资料员：任职要求：1、大专以上学历，工程管理、档案管理等相关专业优先，三年以上有同岗位工作经验者优先；3、具备与岗位所需的相关专业知识，熟练使用办公软件和CAD制图件；4、具有很强的责任心和事业心，工作认真，吃苦耐劳；三、工作地点：柬埔寨金边市质量员：任职要求：1、大专以上学历，机场场道、市政及道路与桥梁相关专业优先；2、从业三年以上，熟悉施工工序，有同岗位工作经验者优先；3、具有很强的责任心和事业心，和抗压能力，工作认真，吃苦耐劳；4、持有新八大员证件者优先。5、熟悉土建类施工图、掌握工程量计算及会CAD简易制图。三、工作地点：柬埔寨金边市安全员:任职要求：1、大专以上学历，工民建、土木工程相关专业；2、2年以上工程安全管理工作经验，具有安全员岗位资质证书优先；3、熟悉国家各项安全法律法规，熟悉生产现场安全工作流程、安全操作规范和安全管理的程序，能够及时发现安全隐患并给予纠正；4、熟悉掌握建筑施工生产过程及安全防护消防、临电等相关安全规章、标准和日常安全管理，有高度的责任心；5、具有一定的协调、组织和沟通能力。三、工作地点：柬埔寨金边市
Company Profile:
上海宝冶（柬埔寨）有限公司 in English called Shanghai Baoye (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. Abbreviated form of a name
SBCC has registered capital is 1 million US dollars. The business scope is general contracting of various housing construction, industrial and municipal public works. The legal representative is the General Manager Xie Hongjun. Shanghai Baoye (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. has six departments including General Affairs Department, Marketing Department, Finance Department, Project Management Department, Safety Supervision Department and Business Contract Purchasing Department, which manage all projects under construction in Cambodia. The company has more than 170 management personnel, of which 70% are localized employees. One-third of them are Cambodian-based foreign managers. The headquarters office is located on the 20th floor of the Oval Office Tower in Phnom Penh, covering an area of 500 square meters. The company is currently build more than a dozen building projects in Cambodia, including the Phnom Penh Chip Mong Building Project, the R&F Phase II Project, the Phnom Penh Sky Villa Deluxe Apartment, the Phnom Penh Gateway Commercial and Residential Building, the Seaview Apartment, and the Golden Sun Sky Entertainment Commercial and Residential Building. Landmark project such as Battambang Conch Cement Factory Project.
Contact Info: Contact Information Thorng Tan  087663633 elly@sbcc-mcc.com Phnom Penh 公司地址：Oval Office Tower , Building No.1, Street 360, Sangkat Boeung Keng Kang 1,Khan Chamkarmon, Phnom Penh. Post code :12302 087663633

job title: ជំនួយការនាយកចាត់ការទូទៅ ចំនួន ០២នាក់ ដើម្បីបម្រើការងារនៅ ការិយាល័យកណ្ដាល
position: ជំនួយការនាយកចាត់ការទូទៅ ចំនួន ០២នាក់ ដើម្បីបម្រើការងារនៅ ការិយាល័យកណ្ដាល
Job Description:
ភារកិច្ច និង ការទទួលខុសត្រូវមាន៖	
១-	អ្នកបកប្រែអមដំណើរ
២-	រៀបចំនិងគ្រប់គ្រងរបាយការណ៍ឆ្លើយឆ្លងនិងឯកសារឆ្លើយឆ្លង
៣-	រៀបចំនិងសម្របសម្រួលកិច្ចប្រជុំ និងគ្រប់គ្រងការធ្វើដំណើរ
៤-	ជួយកិច្ចការរដ្ឋបាលដែលរួមមាន ការគ្រប់គ្រងប្រតិទិននៃការណាត់ជួបសកម្ម និងថែរក្សាប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងឯកសារ
៥-	ការរៀបចំផែនការធ្វើដំណើរ និងលម្អិតផ្លូវ និងរបៀបវារៈ និងការចងក្រងឯកសារសំរាប់ការប្រជុំ
៦-	តាមដានលើចំណុចសកម្មភាពដែលត្រូវបានប្រគល់ដោយលោកនាយកចាត់ការទូទៅដល់បុគ្គលិក និងរាយការណ៍ពីវឌ្ឍនភាព
៧-	ធានាឱ្យមានលំហូរព័ត៌មានចាំបាច់ទាន់ពេលវេលានិងត្រឹមត្រូវ
៨-	កត់ចំណាំ និងរៀបចំកំណត់ហេតុកិច្ចប្រជុំរបៀបវារៈនិងលទ្ធផលប្រជុំ
៩-	ធានានូវការរក្សាការសម្ងាត់ខ្ពស់បំផុតទាក់ទងនឹងការឆ្លើយឆ្លងរបស់លោកនាយកចាត់ការទូទៅ និងក្រុមហ៊ុន ជាមួយអតិថិជនខាងក្នុងនិងខាងក្រៅ គ្រប់អ្នកពាក់ព័ន្ធរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន
១០-	សម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងវិភាគរបាយការណ៍នានា
១១-	ចុះពិនិត្យការងារតាមបណ្ដាខេត្តនានា
១២-	អនុវត្តភារកិច្ចផ្សេងៗទៀត ដែលត្រូវបានចាត់តាំងដោយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង។
Job Requirement:
លក្ខណសម្បត្តិចាំបាច់ត្រូវមាន៖
១-	បានបញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រ
២-	មានបទពិសោធន៍ជាជំនួយការចាប់ពី ០១ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ
៣-	មានជំនាញកុំព្យូទ័រ Microsoft Word & Excel
៤-	មានចំណេះដឹងការងាររដ្ឋបាល (បើមានចំណេះដឹងខាងទឹក និងអគ្គិសនី រឹតតែល្អ)
៥-	អាចចុះតាមបណ្ដាខេត្តបាន និងអាចធ្វើការងារក្រោមសម្ពាធបាន
៦-	ចេះតាមដាន និងចាត់ចែងការងារ
៧-	មានសីលធម៌ល្អ និងចេះសហការការងារជាក្រុមបានល្អ។

របៀបក្នុងការដាក់ពាក្យ៖ បេក្ខជនដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ ត្រូវមកដាក់ពាក្យផ្ទាល់ រួចភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប រូបថត ៤x៦ ០១សន្លឹក វិញ្ញាបនបត្របញ្ជាក់ការសិក្សា អត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណ សៀវភៅគ្រួសារ និងលិខិតបញ្ជាក់ផ្សេងៗ(ថតចម្លង)ឬ
- អ៊ីម៉ែល: info.gbinternational2727@gmail.com 

រាល់ឯកសារដែលបានដាក់ពាក្យហើយ មិនអាចដកវិញបានឡើយ។
- ការិយាល័យកណ្តាល ផ្ទះលេខI34 ភូមិ14 សង្កាត់ទន្លេបាសាក់ ខណ្ឌចំការមន រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។ សម្រាប់ព័ត៌មានបន្ថែមសូមទាក់ទងតាមរយៈទូរស័ព្ទលេខ ៖ 069 85 27 27 ។

Job Description:
- Issue Invoice and Receipts
- Book keeping Quickbook
- Process Account Receivables / Accounts Payables. This includes:
o Attaching invoices to printed checks / Receipts
o Routing for signature by Project Director
o Hard copy files for specific accounts- see Accounts Payable Associates for direction
o Preparing weekly deposits and fill out cash control sheet daily
- Control fixed assets
- Reconcile bank statement
- Petty cash management
- Prepare payroll
- Prepare financial statements (Income statement and Balance sheet)
- Compute taxes owed and prepare tax returns, ensuring compliance with payment, eVAT, reporting and other tax requirements, and provide support during litigation involving financial issues, and handle NSSF payment
- Prepare, examine, and analyze accounting records and other financial reports to assess accuracy, completeness, and conformance to reporting and procedural standards.
- Other projects as assigned by GM/ Director
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in field of Accounting, Finance or other related fields
- At least 2-3 years of experience in a similar position; experience with Property management 
- Good Communication & Interpersonal skills
- Advanced Excel Skills and good English 
- Knowledge in property accounting 
- Ability to work independent and under pressure 
- Strong organizational, analytical and interpersonal skills.
- Self‐motivated to learn new concepts and participate in new projects
- Knowledge on computer Literacy (Microsoft word and Advance Excel)
- Strong numeracy skill
- Keen attention to detail
- Able to work under pressure and multi jobs
- Able to manage the tasks assigned by manager and deliver on time and schedule
- Honest, working hard, and quick learner
- Good in English speaking and writing (Chinese is a plus).

Job Description:
ភារកិច្ច និង ការទទួលខុសត្រូវមាន៖	
លក្ខណសម្បត្តិចាំបាច់ត្រូវមាន៖

១-	ធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពនិងពង្រឹងគោលនយោបាយនិងនីតិវិធីនៃការគ្រប់គ្រងរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុននិងធានានូវការអនុវត្តគោលនយោបាយរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនឱ្យមានប្រសិទ្ធភាព
២-	ធានាបាននូវលំហូរព័ត៌មានរលូននិងគ្រប់គ្រាន់

៤-	ធ្វើកិច្ចសន្យាការព្រមព្រៀងនិងឯកសារចាំបាច់ផ្សេងៗទៀត
៥-	រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំខែ ត្រីមាស ឆមាស និងឆ្នាំ
៦-	រក្សាសុវត្ថិភាពខ្ពស់នៃកន្លែងធ្វើការនិងបរិយាកាសការងារល្អ
៧-	ធ្វើជាអ្នកតំណាងអង្គការនៅក្នុងច្បាប់និងបទបញ្ជារបស់រដ្ឋាភិបាលដែលត្រូវបំពេញ
៨-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យការគ្រប់គ្រងទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិ
Job Requirement:
១-	បានបញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ
២-	បទពិសោធន៍ការងារចាប់ពី ១ឆ្នាំឡើង
៣-	មានចំណេះដឹងកុំព្យូទ័រ (កម្មវិធីការិយាល័យ) អ៊ីនធឺណិត / អ៊ីមែល
៤-	មានជំនាញវិភាគនិងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាល្អ
៥-	មានសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ល្អក្នុងការនិយាយ និងសរសេរ 
៦-	អាចគ្រប់គ្រងភារកិច្ចដោយខ្លួនឯង និងដំណើរការល្អ និងការលើកទឹកចិត្តខ្លួនឯង
៧-	ជំនាញក្នុងការដឹកនាំ និងរៀបចំផែនការ
៨-	មានបទពិសោធន៍ក្នុងការរៀបចំរដ្ឋបាល ការគ្រប់គ្រងឯកសារ សន្តិសុខ និងការគ្រប់គ្រងទីតាំង
៩-	អាចចុះតាមបណ្ដាខេត្តបាន និងអាចធ្វើការងារក្រោមសម្ពាធបាន
១០-	មានសីលធម៌ល្អ និងចេះសហការការងារជាក្រុមបានល្អ។

Job Requirement:
•	ជំនាញ សមត្ថភាពនិង បទពិសោធន៍:
•	បញ្ជប់សញ្ញាប័ត្រថ្នាក់ទុតិយភូមិ។
•	មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិចមួយឆ្នាំទាក់ទងនឹងការដឹកជញ្ជូន។
•	មានជំនាញទំនាក់ទនងល្អជាមួយអតិថិជន។
•	ត្រូវមានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ក្នុងការងារ និងការអធ្យាស្រ័យល្អ។

•	ចំណេះដឹងនៃ ការចែកចាយទំនិញទៅកាន់អតិថិជន និងនីតិវិធីក្នុងការបំពេញការងារ។
•	អាចបើកបរម៉ូតូ និង ត្រីចក្រយានយន្តបាន ។
•	ភារកិច្ចការងារ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវ :
•	ដឹកជញ្ជូនទំនិញទាន់ពេលវេលា និងគ្រប់ចំនួនទៅកាន់អតិថិជន។
•	ត្រូវឲ្យអតិថិជនចុះហត្ថលេខា ប្រគល់ទំនិញឲ្យបានច្បាស់លាស់ លើមុខទំនិញដែលអតិថិជនបានបញ្ជាទិញ។
•	លើកដាក់ឥវ៉ាន់ចេញពីស្តុក ឬចូលស្តុក ។
•	រៀបចំឥវ៉ាន់ទៅតាមលំដាប់លំដោយ និងតាមប្រភេទទំនិញ។
•	ទុកដាក់ឥវ៉ាន់ទៅតាមកន្លែងសមរម្យ សមស្របតាមលក្ខខណ្ឌដែលរោងចក្រកំណត់។ ឧទាហរណ៍ៈ ម៉ាស៊ីនព្រីន ត្រូវដាក់នៅកន្លែងដែលមិនក្តៅពេក ឬត្រជាក់ពេក។
•	បំពេញការងារឃ្លាំងដ៏ទៃទៀត និង ការងារមួយចំនួនទៀតតាមការចាត់តាំងពីអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង ។

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Holzer Design was founded in 2001 by Mr. Alvis as originally exported wood floor to Hong Kong and Indonesia. Today is one of the leading brand in Cambodia with its main focus is on floor, wall and closet.

Company Profile:
COGETEL Ltd. (ONLINE) is the leading ISP and broadband provider in the country; established in July 1997 by Telstra
Cambodia as Bigpond Cambodia – the first commercial Internet Service Provider in the country. In 2002, Cogetel Limited acquired the business from Telstra marking the beginning of its ADSL service and its new brand name – ONLINE.

ONLINE subsequently brought in WiMAX, Long-range WiFi, and Fiber Optic to increase its range of last miles technology to meet any need of its customers.

ONLINE strives to deliver products and services that are tailored to its customers’ Internet technology needs, easily understood and used, delivered with warmth, knowledge and experience throughout the years. Supported by its core drive of keeping people in touch with their world; ONLINE always brings innovative products and services to Cambodia, thus keeping Cambodia abreast with latest technologies worldwide.

Our uniquely tailored services continue to meet the needs of diverse customers – whether for domestic, corporate, single or multiple users, academic or leisure purposes. Online improves communications with the rest of the world through ideal, reliable and secure connection coupled with excellent support services. ONLINE is connected to the world directly through mainland China, Hong Kong, Thailand, European countries, through redundant fiber optic cable making us the most vigorous ISP in Cambodia with abundant and diverse routes around the world.

Our Mission
To deliver technology solutions to achieve superior operational performance that enables us to provide our customers with exceptional service.

Our Vision
To be the primary internet service provider of choice and ideal company that provides fostering work environment.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR & Admin Department HR Manager 016672267 jobs@cogetel.com.kh Phnom Penh #60, Monivong BLvd, Sangkat Wat Phnom, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh 016672267

Cambodia as Bigpond Cambodia – the first commercial Internet Service Provider in the country. In 2002, Cogetel Limited acquired the business from Telstra marking the beginning of its ADSL service and its new brand name – ONLINE.

ONLINE subsequently brought in WiMAX, Long-range WiFi, and Fiber Optic to increase its range of last miles technology to meet any need of its customers.

ONLINE strives to deliver products and services that are tailored to its customers’ Internet technology needs, easily understood and used, delivered with warmth, knowledge and experience throughout the years. Supported by its core drive of keeping people in touch with their world; ONLINE always brings innovative products and services to Cambodia, thus keeping Cambodia abreast with latest technologies worldwide.

Our uniquely tailored services continue to meet the needs of diverse customers – whether for domestic, corporate, single or multiple users, academic or leisure purposes. Online improves communications with the rest of the world through ideal, reliable and secure connection coupled with excellent support services. ONLINE is connected to the world directly through mainland China, Hong Kong, Thailand, European countries, through redundant fiber optic cable making us the most vigorous ISP in Cambodia with abundant and diverse routes around the world.

Our Mission
To deliver technology solutions to achieve superior operational performance that enables us to provide our customers with exceptional service.

Our Vision
To be the primary internet service provider of choice and ideal company that provides fostering work environment.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR & Admin Department HR Manager 016672267 jobs@cogetel.com.kh Phnom Penh #60, Monivong BLvd, Sangkat Wat Phnom, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh 016672267

Job Description:
•	Design, implement, and improve electrical facilities and systems for commercial, industrial, and utility purposes.
•	 Direct and coordinate construction, installation, maintenance, support, documentation, and testing activities to ensure compliance with specifications, codes, and customer requirements. 
•	Perform detailed calculations to compute and establish construction and installation standards and specifications. 
•	Plan and implement methodologies and procedures to apply principles of electrical theory to engineering projects. 
•	Oversee project construction efforts to assure projects are completed satisfactorily, on time and within budget. 
•	Prepare and study technical drawings, specifications of electrical systems, 
•	Investigate customer complaints, determine nature and extent of problem, and recommend remedial measures. 
•	Conduct field surveys and study maps, graphs, diagrams, and other data to identify and correct power system problems. 
•	Maintain a high level of integrity and discipline with a strong work ethic.
•	Management of project administration and documentation
Job Requirement:
•	Cambodian Nationality
•	Graduated Bachelor Degree in Electrical Engineer or equivalent
•	Above 23 years old
•	Over 2 years’ experience as Electrical Engineer
•	Expert knowledge of building, construction details and relevant rules, regulations and quality standards
•	Excellent time and project management skills
•	Leadership and human resources management skills
•	Good communication, problem solving, fast and efficient worker
•	Honesty, Positive, Energetic, and hard-working
•	Demonstrated ability to work with and across different teams
•	Good command of written and spoken English and Khmer
•	Good computer skills in MS Word, and MS Excel, Internet and Email
•	Salary will offer based on qualification and experienced

Job Description:
** Marketing Manager $800-$1200
* Job description: 
- Assist Marketing brand Manager in the daily team management
- Develop and implement marketing plans and projects for any promotion of new and existing products
- Developing strategies and tactics to boost the company's reputation and drive qualified traffic
- Prepare and monitor the marketing budget plan on a query and annual basis
- Measure and report on the performance of marketing campaigns, gain insight and assess against goals
- Analyze consumer behavior advertising campaigns
- Up to date with latest trends and best practices in online marketing and measurement car market
- Organizing company event as press conferences, open days, and exhibitions …
- Work on marketing research 
- Liaise with media and advertising
- Manage in marketing production and materials 
- Manage and update marketing stock 
- Other duties as assigned by brand manger

* Job description: 
- Support event prepare marketing Material
- Internet Search competitor and market research to know the competitor activities 
- follow MKT instruction and work on MKT admin work (AR/PR)
- Conduct various commodity researches provide detailed trend research reports on marketing manager’s request order develop marketing strategies

- Assist in marketing materials purchasing process
- Other duties as assigned
Job Requirement:
** Marketing Manager $800-$1200
* Job requirement 
- At least BBA/MBA in Marketing or related field 
- At least 3-5 years working experience in marketing Manager
- Knowledge of sale and marketing management
- Good communicator and creative thinker, with an ability to use both data and intuition to inform decisions
- Honestly, Hardworking, work under pressure 
- Knowledge of business development

* Job requirement 
- At least bachelor in research, marketing or related field  
- At least 2-3 years working experience in research, sale or marketing 
- Good at Microsoft skill (word, excel, ppt)
- Able to communicate in English 
- Able to work out side for field research or another task assigned by manager 
- Good communicator, and flexible
- Honestly, Hardworking, work under pressure 
- Knowledge of business development

4) វាយតំលៃលើគ្រឿងបន្លាស់ និងពេលវេលាសំរាប់ធ្វើការជួសជុល
5) ជួសជុលម៉ាស៊ីន, ប្រអប់លេខ, គ្រឿងក្រោម, ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ នឹងប្រព័ន្ធភ្លើងជាដើម

8) ថែទាំរថយន្តក្នុង showroom

Job Description:
• Coordinate and oversee all phases of the youth planning, implementation, development and evaluation of the
project, making sure that goals and objectives are met in accordance with proposal and approved strategic plan.
• Assist village director to make arrangement for youth house functioning, health, education, social activities,
security and orders.
• Provide direction, modeling, and mentoring for youth, work with cook and youth in establishing healthy
attachment and promote appropriate developmental skills
• Facilitate and participate in activities, including recreational, social, educational, and daily living activities,
implement point level contingency management system
• Provide discipline in the form of natural and/or imposed consequence, supervise and monitoring resident in all
aspects of the project, provide direction and feedback to youth in a constructive manner.
• Document interaction and behaviors of youth through loggings, point sheet and incident reports, provide
appropriate supervision of youth during all activities, monitor on routine housekeeping as need on shift, assist in
management of cost effective of the project.
• Producing of reports such as, weekly, monthly and on ad-hoc manner when required to village director.
Job Requirement:
- University Degree
- Other qualifications relevant the job.
- Cambodia National age 25 up, is committed the SOS Children & Village Values.
- Experience with children must.
- Good command written spoken English, Khmer languages the ability communicate clearly concisely,
good writing skills.
- Computer literate MS Word, Excel.
- Ability work independently, under pressure, after hour.
- At least 2 of relevant experience NGO
- Good interpersonal skills, Good teamwork.
- Accommodate work with youths.

Job Description:
Factory manager have vital roles and also known as the branch manager.  His duties is to supervise the entire Amrurice Battambang Branch to overseeing plant operations. His typical job responsibilities are ensuring the daily business operation, works’ safety and quality control issues of the production, and ensuring that all tasks need to be carried out perfectly by following industry standards.  
•Factory Manager has to plan production activities, production meetings, and machine maintaining schedules, worker schedules and budget maintenance schedules and quality of products.
•The whole industrial production, paddy drying and rice milling, has to be managed by factory manager, or he/she have to take care of all the features associated with a particular plant department. The safety measures have to be followed.
•If there are any quality related issues, the Factory Manger have to find out the reason and ensure that it is not repeated by working and coordinating with Quality Assurance Manager.
•A Factory Manager has to collaborate and meet with other managers of the company. Liaison with the sourcing department, SRP and Organic department, financial department and export & sales department of much significance.
•Ensure all stock-in and stock-out and stock-balance are recorded accurately and keep reported to top management. 
•Control all company assets. 
•Ensure that all staff in line are abided to the company policy, rules, code of conduct, regulation,   
•Ensure all staff and workers always abide by the safety rules associated with the industry and company standard.
•Maintain the existed  certification, such as GMP/HACCP and Organic 
•Attending the scheduled corporate meetings and training.
•Leading factory meeting and coordinating cross department meeting. 
•Conduct performance appraisal of employees under his/her supervision.
•Do other tasks when requested by top management.
Job Requirement:
•Male-age from 28 to 43 years old  
•At least bachelor degree in Engineering, Science or related field.
•At least 2 year experiences of factory management in food industry or rice sector. 
• Experienced in leading manufacturing projects especially production efficiency, manpower planning and factory compliance
•Broad concepts about managements and leading skill.
•Skill in problem solving and negotiations
•Well organized, excellent negotiation and resolution skills, timely respond, high commitment to deadline 
•Willingness to work as a team, reliable, honest and trustworthy person
•Microsoft Office suits

• ភារៈកិច្ចផ្សេងៗទៀតចាត់ចែងដោយប្រធានផ្នែក។"

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh #11A, St. 402 Sangkat Tomnup teuk, Khan ChomkaMorn. phnom penh 012 797 939

Company Profile:
Samanea is an Asian company, of Asian talents, by Asian investment, for the prosperity of Asian small businesses and the happiness of Asian consumers.

We develops and runs “Markets”, large-scale trade centres each between 100,000 sqm and 500,000 sqm for wholesale and retail of all kinds of manufactured goods.

Surrounding our Market, we build tenant warehouses, business hotels, office buildings, and the Samanea Convention and Exhibition Centre, to further help boost our tenants' business. We provide a basket of services from cross-border shipping to local apartments for our tenants' foreign staff.

Samanea is a magnet of Asian talents, where hundreds of us gather together to pave the way to business innovation, connection, and expansion.

Job Description:
1.	Manage First Aid Medical Room with hygiene, tidiness, arrangement, and discipline.
2.	Prepare Medical forms and patient record for daily using during treatment.
3.	Control medical materials and medicines after daily using.
4.	Prepare new request forms for medical materials and medicines that nearly out of stock.
5.	Provide treatment to all patients who are injured and sick during working hour accordingly.
6.	Report all emergencies case and prepare proper documents.
7.	Provide appropriate first aid treatment before delivery to hospital.
8.	Identify cause of any emergency and act accordingly.
9.	Provide a handover when further medical help arrives.
10.	Follow up all staff`s condition that have been transferred to hospital.
11.	Prepare some relevant lessons for training to all staff such as: first aid procedure, infection control, prevention disease and other related lessons.
12.	Will be cooperating with National Social Security Fund for transferring staffs that have accident during working hours.
13.	Report to the manager if there is a big case that National Social Security Fund cannot cover with treatment bill.

15.	Other work assigned by the manager.

JOB REQUIREMENTS
- Bachelor Degree of Medical Science or General Medicine or relevant (Year 5 or more or graduated).
- Basic knowledge of computer (MS Office) & good command of English.
- Be able to work in the afternoon shift (from 1pm to 10pm).
- Experience as medical doctor/nurse or volunteer/internship is more preferable.

Job Description:
Based at our site in Kampot Province, our Financial Controller oversees the finance function of the Hotel and Casino in a broad role which, leading a team of 18 staff, includes responsibility for accounting, purchasing, cage, treasury and risk management. This is a senior position which reports to the Group Financial Controller, with daily and monthly reporting obligations to other senior management.

Duties and Responsibilities
- Management of three teams with 18 staff
- Ensures that financial controls are efficient and effective
- Controls local purchasing team and inventory
- Responsible for accurate reporting to senior management and group
- Treasury management for the site (including the casino cage)
- Liaise with tax and other government ministries as required
- Sign off on payroll for over 500 staff
- Any other ad-hoc duties as assigned
Job Requirement:
- At least five years of accounting or finance experience required
- Previous finance management experience is desirable
- Experience in liaising with top level management
- Ability to cope with pressure and deliver to tight deadlines and targets
- Target orientated and results driven
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English
- Khmer speaker preferred but not essential
- Excellent organizational skills with attention to detail
- Strong analytic proficiency with the ability to report accurately to the business
- A Bachelors Degree or higher in a related field

Benefits
 Highly competitive salary and benefit provided by the Company.
 Food and accommodation provided by the company.
 Other benefits as directed by Executive Management.

How to apply
Interested applicants should submit their CV and cover letter with 4x6 photo to HTV HR Department by email
to financecareers@hatienvegas.com
Only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

Company Profile: Prime MF Microfinance Institution Ltd. is a licensed microfinance institution with a mission to provide financial services to individuals and groups in Cambodian communities to help them liberate from unprivileged status.  The MFI was registered with the Ministry of Commerce in August 2010 as a financial service provider and obtained a microfinance institution license from the National Bank of Cambodia (NBC) in December 2010. To ensure access to financial services for communities in broader areas, Prime MF has opened its new branch every year since 2013 and recently opened 7th branch in Kampong Speu Province in December 2019. Prime MF is a well-known provider of microfinance service in Phnom Penh with its flexible and speedy process. Company Profile:
Prudential (Cambodia) Life Assurance PLC began operations in Cambodia in January 2013. It is the leading life insurer in Cambodia with more than USD280 million assured and 27,000 policies issued (as at 31 September 2015). One of the first life insurers in Cambodia, Prudential Cambodia is committed to raising the awareness of life insurance among the Cambodian people and helping them protect and secure their financial futures.

Prudential Cambodia is part of UK-based Prudential plc. Founded in 1848, Prudential plc is an international financial services group with significant operations in Asia, the US and the UK. It serves around 25 million insurance customers and have £505 billion of assets under management (as at 30 June 2015). Prudential plc is listed on the stock exchanges in London, Hong Kong, Singapore and New York.

Prudential plc is not affiliated in any manner with Prudential Financial, Inc., a company whose principal place of business is in the United States of America.

** បងប្អូន-កម្មករ-កម្មការិនីទាំងពីរភេទត្រូវមានអាយុពី 18ឆ្នាំ ទៅ 40ឆ្នាំមានកាយសម្បទារឹងមាំ រហ័សរហួន សុខភាពល្អ ស្មោះត្រង់ យកចិត្តទុកដាក់នឹងការងារដោយ៖ 
- មុខតំណែង 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 ត្រូវមានកំរិតសញ្ញាបត្របាក់ឌុប ឬ សញ្ញាបត្របរិញ្ញា ត្រូវចេះប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូ-ទ័រ និង ចេះភាសាអង់គ្លេស ឬ ភាសាចិនអាចប្រើការបាន ផ្តល់អទិភាពចំពោះអ្នកមានបទពិសោធន៍។
- មុខតំណែង 9, 10, 11 ត្រូវមានចំណេះដឹងចេះសរសេរ និង និយាយភាសាខ្មែរបានស្ទាត់ ផ្តល់អទិភាពចំពោះអ្នកមានបទពិសោធន៍។
បងប្អូន-កម្មករ-កម្មការិនីទាំងអស់ ត្រូវភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវឯកសារដូចជា៖ លិខិតថ្កោលទោស (បញ្ជាក់ពីសា-លាឃុំ ឬ ប៉ូលីសឃុំ) អត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណខ្មែរ សំបុត្រកំណើត សៀវភៅគ្រួសារ សៀវភៅស្នាក់នៅ ប័ណ្ណពិនិត្យសុខ-ភាព សៀវភៅការងារ ប័ណ្ណបសស និង រូបថត 3X4 ចំនួន 5សន្លឹក 4X6 ចំនួន 5សន្លឹក។

អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ដែលបងប្អូន-កម្មករ-កម្មការិនីទទួលបានគឺប្រាក់ខែគោល $190 ទៅ $200 ប្រាក់វត្តមានទៀង-ទាត់ (លុយព្រីម) $10 ប្រាក់ធ្វើដំណើរ ឬ ស្នាក់នៅ $7 ប្រាក់បាយថ្ងៃត្រង់ក្នុងមួយថ្ងៃ $0.50 ប្រាក់រង្វាន់ដល់គោលដៅ $5-$20 សាកល្បងការងារចំនួន 02ខែ ហើយថែម 5% ពេលធ្វើកិច្ចសន្យាការងារ រោងចក្ររ៉ាប់រងការធ្វើដំណើរទៅមកដល់បងប្អូន-កម្មករ-កម្មការិនី។
បើបងប្អូន-កម្មករ-កម្មការិនីមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមទំនាក់ទំនងមកកាន់ក្រុមហ៊ុនផ្ទាល់រៀងរាល់ម៉ោង
- ធ្វើការចាប់ពីម៉ោង 7:00 ព្រឹក - 4:00 ល្ងាច ឬ ទំនាក់ទំនងតាមលេខទូរស័ព្ទដូចខាងក្រោម៖ 012 340 111  /  012 234 203  /  098 83 16 78 / 016 601 207
Job Requirement:
Workers of both sexes must be between 18 and 40 years old, physically fit, agile, healthy, honest, and pay attention to work Positions 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 must have a bachelor's degree or a bachelor's degree, must be able to use computer and know English or Chinese, can give priority to experienced people. 

Positions 9, 10, 11 Must have knowledge, can write and speak Khmer fluently, give priority to experienced people.
All workers must bring documents such as the letter of conviction (confirming the letter - Commune or commune police) Khmer ID card, birth certificate, family book, residence book, health check card, work book, 5 ID cards and 5 3X4 photos, 5 4X6 cards.

The benefits that workers receive are a base salary of $ 190 to $ 200, a regular presence (premium) $ 10, travel or accommodation $ 7, a daily lunch $ 0.50, a bonus of $ 5- $ 20, 02 probationary jobs. Month and 5% more when entering into a factory contract to insure travel to and from relatives. If you are interested, please contact the company every hour.

job title: ផ្នែកជំនួយការអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងទូទៅ (Assistant General Manager) $500-$800
position: ផ្នែកជំនួយការអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងទូទៅ (Assistant General Manager) $500-$800
Job Description:
- Assist the Retail Store Manager in planning and implementing strategies to attract customers
- Coordinate daily customer service operations (e.g. sales processes, orders and payments)
- Track the progress of weekly, monthly, quarterly and annual objectives
- Monitor and maintain store inventory
- Evaluate employee performance and identify hiring and training needs
- Supervise and motivate staff to perform their best
- Coach and support new and existing Sales Associates
- Monitor retail operating costs, budgets and resources
- Suggest sales training programs and techniques
- Communicate with clients and evaluate their needs
- Analyze consumer behavior and adjust product positioning
- Handle complaints from customers
- Research emerging products and use information to update the store’s merchandise
- Create reports, analyze and interpret retail data, like revenues, expenses and competition
- Conduct regular audits to ensure the store is functional and presentable
- Make sure all employees adhere to company’s policies and guidelines
- Act as our store’s representative and set an example for our staff

job title: ផ្នែកបញ្ជាទិញ (Purchaser) $300-$800
position: ផ្នែកបញ្ជាទិញ (Purchaser) $300-$800
Job Description:
- Ensure all the Purchase Orders issue on-time and correctly.
- Ensure all the shipments arrive factory according to schedule to meet the delivery date.
- Follow up closely about any claim issued from the production department or other departments.
- Key areas of responsibility
- Checking purchase orders correctly to all requirements from the customer.
- Checking all the purchase orders have been completed the confirmation back from suppliers.
- Checking shipment record.
- Settle all the shipments problem.
- Settle all the materials claim from production or other departments.
- Check payment records.

job title: ផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រងឃ្លាំង (Warehouse manager) $400-$600

- Check stock damage in warehouse which cause by some activities
- Arrange staffs to random check stock compare to system
- Control over the document of receive deliver goods with transporter
- Arrange truck to receive stock at transporter's warehouse
- Arrange staffs to clean around warehouse, both inside and outside

- Arrange team count stock truck every month
- Control Check list report by schedule on board every month

job title: ផ្នែកជំនាញមើលថែប្រព័ន្ធលូទឹក ចំរោះទឹក (Sewage Management Technician) $300-$600
position: ផ្នែកជំនាញមើលថែប្រព័ន្ធលូទឹក ចំរោះទឹក (Sewage Management Technician) $300-$600
Job Description:
- Monitor wastewater operations
- Analyze instantaneous and historical data to decide on needed operational adjustments
- Assist operating management in the installation and maintenance of environmental compliance measures
- Assist management in interpreting and applying technical regulatory requirements
- Log all operational data and produce frequent reports
- Troubleshoot process, instrumentation, data and mechanical problems
- Perform basic maintenance, repair and calibration
- Respond to any related emergencies
- Work closely with adjacent farming operations to insure land application of treated wastewater is compliant
- Monitor cost control measures for environmental compliance
- Remain up-to-date on new developments in regulatory changes
- Communicate effectively with plant management regarding all waste treatment

job title: ផ្នែកត្រួតពិនិត្យគុណភាព (Irradiation Workshop) $350-$700
position: ផ្នែកត្រួតពិនិត្យគុណភាព (Irradiation Workshop) $350-$700
Job Description:
- Install, maintain and repair electrical control, wiring, and lighting systems.
- Read technical diagrams and blueprints.
- Perform general electrical maintenance.
- Inspect transformers and circuit breakers and other electrical components.
- Troubleshoot electrical issues using appropriate of testing devices.
- Repair and replace equipment, electrical wiring, or fixtures.
- Follow National Electrical Code state and local building regulations.
- Circuit breaker corrective maintenance.
- Good knowledge of heating and air conditioning systems.
- Good knowledge of various test equipment.

job title: ផ្នែកកម្មករឡចំហាយទឹក (Boiler Controller) $250-$500
position: ផ្នែកកម្មករឡចំហាយទឹក (Boiler Controller) $250-$500
Job Description:
- Monitor and Maintain Boilers: Boiler operators perform frequent inspection checks and regular maintenance on boiler systems and related valves, gauges, piping, and other equipment.
- Inspect Fluids: Boiler operators constantly inspect water, gas, and other fluid levels inside boilers and related equipment, making adjustments to fluids as necessary to keep systems operating at peak levels.
- Repair Boiler Machinery: Boiler operators repair piping, valves, and other boiler machinery as needed.
- Replace Boiler Parts: Boiler operators replace defective valves, gauges, and other boiler parts as needed.
- Record Daily Readings: Boiler operators record daily gas readings, feed water tests, and other test results.
- Adjust Equipment: Boiler operators adjust valves and boiler controls as needed to control the amount of pressure in the system and keep the boiler system functioning safely.
- Maintain Cleanliness: Boiler operators keep all boiler rooms, related facilities, and work areas clean and organized at all times.

job title: ផ្នែកកម្មករឡចំអិន (Oven Controller) $250-$500
position: ផ្នែកកម្មករឡចំអិន (Oven Controller) $250-$500
Job Description:
- Supervise and work along with a small production team in the cook room.
- Accountable for daily pre-operations inspections (i.e.; Smoke Houses, Conveyer Owens, Chilling Machines) of machinery and paperwork for cook room.
- Responsible for setting up the production line/room before the start of the shift.
- Monitor and accurately record actual use, cooked weights, temperatures and other important information on the appropriate forms.
- Inspection of cooked food and chilled food to ensure food is being prepared as per the given requirements.
- Requires pushing, pulling and towing of heavy trailers, wagons and racks with wheels within the cook room.
- Ensure a clean and safe work area following all organization's health and safety practices
- Responsible and adapt to all management daily plans of production.
- Make sure that all employees are following relevant Food Safety Regulations in regards to product handling

Job Description:
•	Receive and verify claim documents and enter data into the System, and ensure that proper claim filing procedures is followed
•	Ensure quality claim services by responding to customers’ inquiries and resolving their complaint
•	Ensure effective communication with sale team, claimant, and other related parties, such as hospital, doctor, bank partners, local authority, witness, etc. to gather complete information needed to get the optimum claim results with efficient turnaround time
•	Examine and assess claim by reviewing insured’s insurance policy, medical documentations, credit document, and other additional information collected from outside sources, including claimant, hospital, doctor, bank partners, local authority, insured’s employer, other insurance companies, etc.
•	Initiating or conducting on-site and off-site investigation of questionable claims
•	Confer and consult reinsurers for claim assessment and payment as set out in reinsurance treaty and guideline
•	Confer with legal compliance and other related departments, and in some cases outside legal counsel for claim process and litigation 
•	Ensure that all claim assessment and claim payment are in compliant with policies terms and conditions, Company’s policies and procedures as well as applicable law and regulations.
•	Verify claim payment amount, prepare claim payment request and ensure timely disbursement of claim payment to claimant 
•	Draft claim decision documents (acceptance, rejection, and others) and make recommendation with justifiable reasons for Management’s decision and approval 
•	Maintain claim file and record, prepare claim reports and other claim administrative process.
•	Review and recommend changes to claims process, guideline, and any related document/form
•	Carry out other duties as assigned by the line manager.
Job Requirement:
•	Medical Doctor or Bachelor degree in law or related fields
•	Minimum 1 year experience in claim in life or general insurance, and/or underwriting in life insurance
•	Knowledgeable in medical terminology  and able to analyze and interpret medical history 
•	Sound judgment, analytical and good problem solving skill, sale and customer service-oriented
•	Strong interpersonal skills and ability to manage and work independently and as part of a team with all levels of employees.
•	Initiative with a high sense of responsibility 
•	Attention to detail and ability to multi-task, prioritize, and manage time effectively 
•	Independent, self-driven, and highly motivated
•	High integrity and ability to maintain utmost confidentiality of customer’s and company’s information.
•	Good communication in both written and spoken English
•	Computer literate
Company Profile: Sovannaphum Life Assurance is a joint venture company between Canadia Investment Holding PLC and Muang Thai Life Assurance PLC. Since starting its operation in 2016, Sovannaphum Life has served to more than 60,000 customers. Sovannaphum Life has been awarded The Fastest Growing Life Insurance Company in Cambodia for 3 consecutive years, 2018, 2019 & 2020. We are here for you, we are you for Cambodia. ​For more info, visit www.sovannphumlife.com or official ​Facebook & Instagram page.

Job Description:
Location	: Phnom Penh, Cambodia
Schedule	: Full Time

Salary		: Competitive

- Creating promotional information to drive business
- Coordinating multiple channels of marketing strategies
- Managing budgets for marketing campaigns
- Testing new marketing opportunities
- Building relationships with media outlets
- Directing social media strategies
- Evaluating performances of marketing campaigns
- Troubleshooting marketing campaigns that are not performing well
- Monitoring and improving SEO
- Managing employees and third-party vendors
- Addressing customer service problems
- Coming up with new ways to promote new products
- Educating employees about industry marketing trends
- Analyzing customer feedback from social media platforms
- Analyzing advertising returns and reporting to senior management

- Solid knowledge of website analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics)
- Numerically literate, comfortable working with numbers, making sense of metrics and processing figures with spreadsheets
- A sense of aesthetics and a love for great copy and witty communication
- Up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in online marketing and measurement
- BSc/MSc degree in Marketing or related field

Job Description: Job brief: Head of FinanceWe are looking for a reliable Senior Financial Manager that will analyze every day financial activities and subsequently provide advice and guidance to upper management on future financial plans.The goal is to enable the company’s leaders to make sound business decisions and meet the company’s objectives.Responsibilities•	Provide financial reports and interpret financial information to managerial staff while recommending further courses of action.•	Advise on investment activities and provide strategies that the company should take•	Maintain the financial health of the organization.•	Analyze costs, pricing, variable contributions, sales results and the company’s actual performance compared to the business plans.•	Develop trends and projections for the firm’s finances.•	Conduct reviews and evaluations for cost-reduction opportunities.•	Oversee operations of the finance department, set goals and objectives, and design a framework for these to be met.•	Manage the preparation of the company’s budget.•	Liase with auditors to ensure appropriate monitoring of company finances is maintained.•	Correspond with various other departments, discussing company plans and agreeing on future paths to be taken.
Job Requirement: Requirements•	Proven experience as a Head of Financial / Senior Financial Manager•	Experience in the financial sector with previous possible roles such as financial analyst•	Extensive understanding of financial trends both within the company and general market patterns•	Proficient user of finance software i.e. SAP Pro, QuickBooks •	Strong interpersonal, communication and presentation skills•	Able to manage, guide and lead employees to ensure appropriate financial processes are being used•	A solid understanding of financial statistics and accounting principles•	Working knowledge of all statutory legislation and regulations regarding VAT and Import duties.•	BS/MA degree in Finance, Accounting or Economics•	Professional qualification such as CFA/CPA or similar will be considered a plus•	Must have strong working knowledge of SAP Pro software for Medium Enterprise businesses.

Company Profile:
FTB is Cambodia's first and foremost bank. It is a private commercial bank and has been providing customers with safe and reliable banking services for 40 years. 

The Bank was created following Sub-decree No. 1213 dated 10 October 1979 under the former regime of the State of Cambodia. In 2000, the Bank was          separated from the direct management of the National Bank of Cambodia ("the Central Bank") in order to transform its permanent identity into a state-owned commercial bank in Cambodia with the features of a Public Economic Enterprise and with the intention of conducting autonomous business              operations. 

In January 2001, the Bank obtained its banking license from the Central Bank to operate as a commercial bank in the Kingdom of Cambodia for a period of      three years starting from 4 January 2001. This was the first license granted to enable the Bank to operate as a separate legal entity independent from the Central Bank's direct management. On 8 January 2004, the Bank obtained its 2nd banking license from the Central Bank for a period of three years starting    from that date. The Bank now holds a commercial banking license, which was renewed for an indefinite period, on 21 December 2006

On 31 December 2002, the Ministry of Economy and Finance ("MEF") announced, through a Statement of Intent, the privatisation of the Bank as part of the   reform of the financial sector of the Royal Government of Cambodia. On 28 October 2005 the shareholders of the Bank, represented by the Privatisation   Committee, entered into a sales agreement with Canadia Bank and ING Holding Company. The Central Bank sold its 20% shareholding in the Bank and MEF   reduced its 80% shareholding to 10%. In 2009, in accordance with the recommendation of the Central Bank, Canadia Bank reduced its shares from 48% to  15.22% and 2 new private shareholders having respectively a share of 15.39%, entered the capital of FTB. The Bank's Memorandum and Articles of

into account costs, delivery times and product quality.•	Protects company value by keeping information confidential•	Product training the sale teams at weekly, monthly, quarterly•	Recommends the return-on-investment analyses; establishing time schedules with engineering and manufacturing•	Introduces and markets new products by developing time-integrated plans with sales, advertising, and production.•	Determines product pricing by utilizing market research data; reviewing production and sales costs; anticipating volume; costing special and customized orders.•	completes operational requirements by scheduling and assigning employees; following up on work results.•	Maintains product management staff by recruiting, selecting, orienting, and training employees.•	Gathers, manages, and prioritizes market/customer requirements.•	Gain a deep understanding of customer experience, identify and fill product gaps and generate new ideas that grow market share, improve customer experience and drive growth.•	Develop product pricing and positioning strategies•	Evaluate promotional plans to ensure that they are consistent with product line strategy and that the message is effectively conveyed•	Developing and implementing strategies that resonate with the target market.•	carrying out market research in order to keep up to date with customer trends, as well as trying to predict future trends•	Contributes to annual brand planning process.•	Leads the development of strategies and objectives for building and executing year-round brand engagement through partnerships, and social media.•	Represents the company and provides support as needed at various trade shows and conventions.Performs other duties as necessary to support the objectives of division and company needs.•	carrying out market research in order to keep up to date with customer trends, as well as trying to predict future trends•	Planning and executing marketing initiatives including campaigns, events, sponsorships and corporate social responsibility programs.

Company Profile:
FTB is Cambodia's first and foremost bank. It is a private commercial bank and has been providing customers with safe and reliable banking services for 40 years. 

The Bank was created following Sub-decree No. 1213 dated 10 October 1979 under the former regime of the State of Cambodia. In 2000, the Bank was          separated from the direct management of the National Bank of Cambodia ("the Central Bank") in order to transform its permanent identity into a state-owned commercial bank in Cambodia with the features of a Public Economic Enterprise and with the intention of conducting autonomous business              operations. 

In January 2001, the Bank obtained its banking license from the Central Bank to operate as a commercial bank in the Kingdom of Cambodia for a period of      three years starting from 4 January 2001. This was the first license granted to enable the Bank to operate as a separate legal entity independent from the Central Bank's direct management. On 8 January 2004, the Bank obtained its 2nd banking license from the Central Bank for a period of three years starting    from that date. The Bank now holds a commercial banking license, which was renewed for an indefinite period, on 21 December 2006

On 31 December 2002, the Ministry of Economy and Finance ("MEF") announced, through a Statement of Intent, the privatisation of the Bank as part of the   reform of the financial sector of the Royal Government of Cambodia. On 28 October 2005 the shareholders of the Bank, represented by the Privatisation   Committee, entered into a sales agreement with Canadia Bank and ING Holding Company. The Central Bank sold its 20% shareholding in the Bank and MEF   reduced its 80% shareholding to 10%. In 2009, in accordance with the recommendation of the Central Bank, Canadia Bank reduced its shares from 48% to  15.22% and 2 new private shareholders having respectively a share of 15.39%, entered the capital of FTB. The Bank's Memorandum and Articles of
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  023862111 hr@ftb.com.kh Building No. 33 C-D, Tchecoslovaquie Blvd (169), Sangkat Veal Vong, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 023862111

Job Description:
Reporting to the Internal Audit Department Manager, the primary functions of the position are to develop an understanding of the operation of the area subject to audit, to plan and design an audit program identifying key risks and controls and to conduct an audit evaluating controls, identifying weaknesses and documenting results.

Main Duties
•	Conduct operation and compliance audit at branches and business units
•	Draft internal audit report for Internal Audit Department Manager to review
•	Assist in evaluating operational efficiencies and contribute to improve overall structure and practices 
•	Assist in developing audit planning and detect key weakness areas
•	Monitor and enforce compliance with banking regulation and accounting standards
•	Follow up on the progress of implementation and recommendation
•	Assist tracking all audit issues and management's corrective action to final resolution 
•	Check compliance with internal established policies, procedures and regulations
•	Assist audit team in conducting spot check 
•	Perform other related duties as assigned
Job Requirement:
Skills/ Experiences
•	Bachelor degree in Auditing, Finance, Accounting or other related fields 
•	Fresh graduate are welcome.
•	Fluency of English and Khmer in both speaking and writing
•	Strong analytical skill and ability to check and diagnose problems
•	Strong organizational, interpersonal, team player and good negotiation skills
•	Computer Literacy in MS office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)
•	Willingness to travel to provinces

On 28 October 2005 the shareholders of the Bank, represented by the Privatisation   Committee, entered into a sales agreement with Canadia Bank and ING Holding Company. The Central Bank sold its 20% shareholding in the Bank and MEF   reduced its 80% shareholding to 10%. In 2009, in accordance with the recommendation of the Central Bank, Canadia Bank reduced its shares from 48% to  15.22% and 2 new private shareholders having respectively a share of 15.39%, entered the capital of FTB. job title: Credit Officer ជាច្រើននាក់ ដូចជា៖​ ភ្នំពេញ,កៀនស្វាយ, កំពង់ចាម, កំពង់ស្ពឺ,សៀមរាប,អ្នកលឿង(ព្រៃវែង)។
position: Credit Officer ជាច្រើននាក់ ដូចជា៖​ ភ្នំពេញ,កៀនស្វាយ, កំពង់ចាម, កំពង់ស្ពឺ,សៀមរាប,អ្នកលឿង(ព្រៃវែង)។
Job Description:
- Find potential clients to get the loan products and services in their geographic areas or boundaries.
- Build a very good relationship with all levels of local authorities to get their supports on loan documents process.
- Analyze borrowers’ business plan and financial flows to get more and more reliable data and information related to their businesses income and family status.
- Assess and evaluate borrowers’ properties with the up to date market price and check the legal ownership.
- Educate the credit rule and policies strictly to borrowers before processing the loan documents.
- Set up the plan with CCO, CM and OM for loan disbursement 
projection as monthly, quarterly and annually basis.
- Closely follow up the borrowers on their business change or any problems then report to direct supervisor for taking early action on time. Ensure the loan repayment with 100% & follow up
- Work closely with marketing and product development officer to research competitor business strength and weakness and new product development.
- Make a daily report to CCO for consolidating all data to make a daily client information and loan document submit record to OM, GM and CEO.
Job Requirement:
- BBA in management, finance and banking and accounting.
- Age 20 to 35 years old. Cambodian male only
- Honesty, initiative, flexibility, high commitment and good inter-personal and communication skills.
- Good working knowledge of computer (Ms. Office & Internet).
- Ability to effectively communicate in English and Khmer.
- Good understanding of Cambodian micro finance rules and regulations, law on real estate and contract law.

*** We are offer good condition for high candidate with good remuneration and fringe benefit such allowance insurance uniform annual salary increment end year double pay profit sharing and annual leave as well with careers development.

Note: Only shortlisted candidate will contact for interviews.

Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.
