Job Description:
- Build and lead to growth LOLC’s merchant base through new merchant partnerships, identifying the
growth sectors and renewing the existing relationships.
- Develop ideas for merchant campaigns, managing campaigns process and execution. Conducting market
analysis and research for existing and new potential merchants.
- Handle all merchants proposed to create from customer including briefing the benefit of merchant and
condition, verify agreement, merchant registration, create merchant in iPay portal, and verify and send QR Code to merchants.
- End to end responsibility for merchant performance growth and acting as the lead for the vertical.
Preparation of presentations slide and closely facilitating with sales team and branches for recruiting and
presenting to potential merchants.
- Work closely with merchants and marketing department to initiate and develop the effective promotional
materials to promote iPay services and other financial services and ensuring that the merchant operation
is running smoothly and effectively.
- Working directly with the Branch Manager and Regional Manager to actively plan out strategies for business growth and merchant expansion.
- Develop a strategic plan for merchant activities in partnership with other companies and other entities,
manage new and existing partners joint campaigns to successfully meet the KPI.
- Develop and report the merchant services with analyzing and recommendation for management and branches and follow up the performance, identify any risk happened and mitigation risk.
- Develop, enhance the guideline and procedures of iPay Merchant necessary to meet requirements of both
customers and the LOLC.
- Work closely with cross function to optimize the partnership and solving all issues raised by merchant and
consumer complaints.
- Perform other tasks assigned by Head of Deposit and Financial Services Department.
Job Requirement:
- Graduated Bachelor Degree in Finance and Banking or related field.
- Knowledgeable in financial institution law and regulations in Cambodia.
- Minimum 3 year-experiences in digital banking products and merchants
- Experience with team management.
- Strong leadership and communication skills.
- High commitment.
- Good English communication with both writing and speaking.

Job Description:
- Support Leasing Manager in retail planning which includes trade/ tenant mix review and planning
- Source and secure suitable tenants that fit into the desired tenant mix of the mall. This will include active
cold callings, site viewings and negotiation on new leases and renewals
- Preparation and tracking of lease documentation and marketing kits
- Responsible for operating the various systems and tools in tenant sales and lease performance monitoring,
rental analysis and forecasting, management reporting
- On-going market research on new trends within industry
- Assist in the setting up of and overseeing related lease management and Point of Sales System
- Monitor tenants’ turnover performance to ensure overall turnover objective of the Mall is met
- Support feasibility studies and formulation of new innovative retail formats and curated concepts
- Responsible for the upkeep of files and maintenance of tenancy/sales documents in an orderly manner
- Work alongside with Legal, Finance, Operations and Marketing …
- Builds and maintain good working relationships with business partners
- Support Leasing manager in prepare report and present to senior management and group
- Research, analyze and make recommendations concerning prospective tenants
- Exercise positive team approach to problem solving
Job Requirement:
- Diploma/ Degree in Real Estate Management, Business Administration, Marketing or equivalent
- At least 3 years experiences in retail leasing especially shopping mall, demonstrate a successful leasing achievement.
- Proven track record in retail leasing with good networking of tenants and contacts
- Good written and spoken communications skills, with strong negotiation and numeracy skill
- Meticulous, ability to multi-task and work withing tight timeline
- Strong report and presentation skill
- Excellence English, and Chinese is an advantage
- Very good computer skill especially MS Excel (database), Power Point.
- Team player, positive, independent, out-going and resourceful
- Demonstrated supervisory and mentoring skills
- Excellence English, if Chinese is an advantage
- Very good computer skill especially MS Excel (database), Power Point.
- High commitment and reliability.

company_name: Oxley-Worldbridgeland Asset Management (Cambodia) Co., Ltd (The Peak Mall)
Job Description:
- Daily manage shopping mall operations, which included tenant’s operations, facilities management
(security, cleaning, parking, pest control, landscaping, MEP system and fit out)
- Manage, allocate & plan facilities management manpower and keep monitoring their performance to
ensure the qualities services to be performed.
- Provide direction to Teams (Technician, Fit-out, Security, Cleaning) to ensure their actions are consistent
with the overall direction of Company
- Ensure consistency and integrity when managing internal and external relationships.
- Promote Team work spirit, between team member and cross department
- Provide support and work closely with other team members such as Marketing, Leasing, Finance.
- Influence marketing programs that drive foot traffic to the mall
- Establishing work parameters (plans, budgets, targets and resource allocations) for reporting teams by managing
the skill set of these teams and to ensure that they can achieve set objectives.
- Propose, recommend the best practice/strategy to line manager in the competitive market
- Comprehensive knowledge of competitors, their activities and their potential impact on the business.
- Communicate information in a clear and concise manner by using communication tools to foster communication
within the business.
- Ensure all policies, procedures and methodologies are adhered and implemented
- Ensure mall facilities and systems are maintained at the required standards to provide for a safe and
comfortable shopping experience.
- Identify cost-reducing / value-adding opportunities that benefit the shopping mall and manage operation
expenses
- Reflects on what needs to be done and develop Action Plans to improve operational efficiencies.
- Regular visit tenants to determine ongoing needs and expectations on Mall’s performance and using feedback from Tenants and shoppers to improve mall performance.
- Manage tenant relationships when conflict occurs and/or when tenants’ expectations are not met and
escalate the unresolved issues to immediate supervisor
- Working on improvement feedback from Tenants and shoppers with concern department for improvement
and effective performance.
- Prepare operation report (daily, weekly, monthly) identify the activities and issues to be improved and
overall mall performance
- Perform other duties as assigned by Line manager
Job Requirement:
- Degree in Management, Economic, Engineering
- At least 3 years experiences in shopping mall operation management, commercial property management on day to day dealing with operation.
- Flexible and energetic and challenging with multi-tasking job with people management skill.
- Understanding of consumer marketing and labor laws
- General technical knowledge of MEP and Fit out work
- Excellence English, if Chinese is an advantage
- Strong verbal and written communication, and negotiation skills
- Competent in formal report writing and Presentation skills
- Demonstrated supervisory and mentoring skills
- A team player with the ability to work independently and unsupervised
- Be self-motivated and performance focused
- Ability to work under pressure and flexible working hour (schedule working hours)
- A strong and mature leader and team player
- High commitment and reliability.

Job Description:
-	Completed bachelor degree of business or related major
-	Having at least 3 years working experience in retail leasing field
-	Having wide network in retail market
-	Knowledgeable about market trend
-	Possessing excellence communication, negotiation and problem solving skills
-	Able to work under pressure and within deadline

-	Tracking whether all work is done within the work flows as set

Job Description:
-	Assist GRA Manager to manage and review company’s policies and SOP to ensure they are aligned with Business Strategy and Governance
-	Assist GRA Manager in reviewing Business Process Flows Proposal to ensure for effectiveness
-	Assist GRA Manager in reviewing and updating the Risk and Control Register Framework
-	Assist GRA Manager to monitor the Key Risk Indicators (KRI) to ensure the Company is able to timely response and prevent the potential risks
-	Assist GRA Manager to validate the Self-Control Risk Assessment (RCSA) for each core process
-	Collect and review the Loss Event Data (LED), analyze the main reasons, and provide sufficient appropriate recommendations as necessary
Job Requirement:
-	Bachelor degree in Accounting and Finance or pursuing ACCA
-	3 to 4 years experiences in external or internal audit or risk management with construction, shopping mall or Hotel industry
-	Have knowledge of risks identification, assessment, and management frameworks.
-	Have knowledge of control frameworks and the ability to design and evaluate effectiveness of controls embedded within business processes
-	Be honest, highly committed, and flexible
-	Able to work under pressure, independently as well as in team
-	Fluent in written and spoken Khmer and English, Chinese is a plus

Job Description:
1.	Perform annual risks assessments for all delegated companies and projects.
2.	Draft annual internal audit planning as result of risks assessment and submit to Head of Internal Audit to review.
3.	Assist Head of Internal Audit to manage audit team to deliver audit report as stated in annual audit plan
4.	Assist Head of Internal Audit to set and review audit staffs’ KPI.
5.	Coach, train and develop auditing staff to upgrade their knowledge.
6.	Review and submit audit plan, working papers, and audit report of each engagement to Head of Internal Audit approve on time.
7.	Communicate findings to projects or companies’ senior management
8.	Build and maintain the relationship with company executive.
9.	Comply with company policies and internal audit code of ethic and assist Head of Internal Audit to manage audit staff to ensure that they are comply with internal audit code of ethic as well as company policies.
10.	Others tasks assign by Head of Internal Audit
Job Requirement:
1.	Bachelor degree in Business, Accounting or Finance and preferably ACCA
2.	Minimum 5 year experience of related field
3.	Management and leadership skill
4.	Performance Management
5.	Presentation Skill

Job Description:
	To do ground surveying by Total Station tool or D-GPS tool
	To do topographic update map and calculate volume
	To work follow road cut and quarry design to relation with planning.
	Able to used computation software as Auto CAD, and some surveying software, etc.
	Able to operate the Total Station machine, Mapping, Leveling machine.
	Able to set bend mark, line marking, and coordination boundary point.
	Make cross section, mapping, and drawing.
	Cooperate daily on the contractor/sub-contractor’s work.
	Ensure the correct location of building/part of building.
	To provide on-going and continuous contractual advice during construction to ensure that all parties strictly adhere to the corrected Works
	Daily Site Inspection and survey report
Job Requirement:
	A Bachelor degree in Civil Engineering /Surveying, or related field.
	Good command of English.
	Basic AutoCAD Land Development of Civil 3D, or Terramodel.
	Possess good coordination skills with effective negotiation base.
	At least 1-2 years working experience in surveying field.
	Good Skilled at using & operating the Total Station machine, Mapping, Leveling machine.
	Competent in computer skills (MS-Office, Project, Internet and email, AutoCAD)
	Possess good problem solving skills and management skills
	Possess communication skills in Khmer and/or English
	Hard working and be able to work under pressure 
	Good ethical manner and moral attitude

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information Bunthoeun Keo (Mr.)  088 222 8261 | 016-061 698 602 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 088 222 8261 | 016-061 698 602

Company Profile:
WHO WE ARE
Pointer is an innovative real estate agency specialized in
the sales and marketing of residential and commercial properties. Our services range from project sales and
marketing, property brokerage, development consultation,
property management to development of property technology. We believe in creating real value on every real estate transaction that we are involved.

WHAT WE DO
We are currently building a cutting-edge property technology platform, offering sales & management solutions
to property developers, pairing the top agents with buyers/sellers and making the search and sell experience of
real estate convenience

VISION
We envision a world where people are empowered to make the right decisions on real estate transactions by having access to the most accurate information and data.

OUR MISSION
Our mission is to help people find the right property by equipping our property consultants with tools and knowledge
necessary to give reliable advice to our customers.

Job Description:
- Operates tractor equipped with concave blade attached across front to gouge out, level, and distribute earth and to push trees and rocks from land preparatory to constructing roads and buildings or planting crops, or in mining, quarrying, and lumbering operations: Fastens attachments to tractor with clevis or wedge-pin hitches.
- Connects hydraulic hoses, belts, mechanical linkage, or power takeoff shaft to tractor to provide power to raise, lower, or tilt attachment.
- Moves levers to control tool bars, carriers, and disks.
- Moves levers and depresses pedals to maneuver tractor and raise, lower, and tilt attachment to clear right-of-way.
- Feels lever and listens for stalling action of engine to estimate depth of cut.
- Drives bulldozer in successive passes over terrain to raise or lower terrain to specified grade following markings on grade stakes or hand signals.
- Greases, oils, and performs minor repairs on tractor, using grease gun, oilcans, and handtools.
- When required to work to close tolerances, may be designated Fine-Grade-Bulldozer Operator.
- When operating bulldozer to loosen soil, may be designated Scarifier Operator.
- May be designated according to type of tractor operated as Crawler-Tractor Operator; Forest Fire Equipment Operator; or attachment added as Angledozer Operator.
- May operate bulldozer to scrape surface clay to determine existence and types of clay deposits or to gather clay into piles preparatory to removal to brick-and-tile manufacturing plant and be designated Scraper Operator.
Job Requirement:
- Be able to work at province
- Experience at least 5 years in Mechanical or related field
- Knowledge of mechanical skill with all machinery.
- Having a technical or technological aptitude.
- Hard working and conscientious
- Good command of spoken and written English
- Hard-working, self-motivated, smart and fast learner
Company Profile:
Hong Lai Huat Group Limited (HLH Group) is a well-established and reputable real estate and property developer with 30 years of successful track record. Established since 1998, the Group has completed numerous projects in Singapore ranging from public and private resident developments, to commercial and industrial building. Some of its notable developments include D’Ecosia, D’s Fresco, D’s Castilia, D’Almira, D’ Lithium, D’Kranji Farm Resort and D’Centenial.

In 2008, the Group diversified into the agriculture sector in Cambodia and had since completed the development of a 10,000 hectares farmland that cultivates cassava, as well as invested in a cassava starch production factory.

The Group also expanded into property development in Cambodia with the development of its first freehold mixed-used project- D’ Seaview, in Sihanouk Ville. One of the largest mixed-use developments in Sihanouk Ville, D’Seaview comprises 737 residential units and 64 commercial units. HLH Group was listed on the Mainboard of the Singapore Exchange on 21st June 2000.

1- HLH Agriculture (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
2- HLHI (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
3- Royal Hong Lai Haut One Company Limited.
4- Jewel A Development Co., Ltd.
5- Agri-Oral Joint Cooperate Co., Ltd.
6- Public Housing Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
7- PH One Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.

条件：会现场的机电施工管理，机电经验验收资料等。

所学工程：土木工程
条件：会现场的土建施工管理，质量控制，土建验收资料，晚上参与打灰等。

Job Requirement:
薪资：
1. 薪水：试用期3个月,试用期薪水面议。试用期结束后，薪水根据各人能力会有所提升。
2. 年终奖：有十三或十四薪。具体根据员工的个人表现。

Company Profile:
上海宝冶（柬埔寨）有限公司 in English called Shanghai Baoye (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. Abbreviated form of a name
SBCC has registered capital is 1 million US dollars. The business scope is general contracting of various housing construction, industrial and municipal public works. The legal representative is the General Manager Xie Hongjun. Shanghai Baoye (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. has six departments including General Affairs Department, Marketing Department, Finance Department, Project Management Department, Safety Supervision Department and Business Contract Purchasing Department, which manage all projects under construction in Cambodia. The company has more than 170 management personnel, of which 70% are localized employees. One-third of them are Cambodian-based foreign managers. The headquarters office is located on the 20th floor of the Oval Office Tower in Phnom Penh, covering an area of 500 square meters. The company is currently build more than a dozen building projects in Cambodia, including the Phnom Penh Chip Mong Building Project, the R&F Phase II Project, the Phnom Penh Sky Villa Deluxe Apartment, the Phnom Penh Gateway Commercial and Residential Building, the Seaview Apartment, and the Golden Sun Sky Entertainment Commercial and Residential Building. Landmark project such as Battambang Conch Cement Factory Project.

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.

Company Profile:
Hong Lai Huat Group Limited (HLH Group) is a well-established and reputable real estate and property developer with 30 years of successful track record. Established since 1998, the Group has completed numerous projects in Singapore ranging from public and private resident developments, to commercial and industrial building. Some of its notable developments include D’Ecosia, D’s Fresco, D’s Castilia, D’Almira, D’ Lithium, D’Kranji Farm Resort and D’Centenial.

In 2008, the Group diversified into the agriculture sector in Cambodia and had since completed the development of a 10,000 hectares farmland that cultivates cassava, as well as invested in a cassava starch production factory.

The Group also expanded into property development in Cambodia with the development of its first freehold mixed-used project- D’ Seaview, in Sihanouk Ville. One of the largest mixed-use developments in Sihanouk Ville, D’Seaview comprises 737 residential units and 64 commercial units. HLH Group was listed on the Mainboard of the Singapore Exchange on 21st June 2000.

1- HLH Agriculture (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.

4- Jewel A Development Co., Ltd.
5- Agri-Oral Joint Cooperate Co., Ltd.
6- Public Housing Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
7- PH One Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.

Job Description:
** General:
- Responsible for all finance, accounting and tax related matters
- Responsible for the financial result of the area
- Responsible for the risks / exposures for all business units
- Drives value creation initiatives in close cooperation with Regional Management
- Ensures high quality and timely reporting for group, tax and statutory/legal reporting
- Ensures reporting and accounting according Reporting and Accounting Manual

** Job responsibilities:
Planning, Steering and Controlling
- Participation in the business plan development and definition of objectives short/mid term
- Proactive analysis of investment plans
- Steers the short-term planning (budget/forecast) process
- Analyzes results, reports findings to area management and ensures/supervises implementation of action plans.
- Ensures compliance to the Internal Control System (ICS)
- Proactively drives the value creation program and value creating initiatives for the corresponding country/area

** Treasury and Foreign Exchange Management
Supervise:
- Cash planning, management and funding requirements
- Foreign currency management in line with Group standards
- Handles of corporate and bank guarantees
- Releases payments to bank

Reporting
- Monthly, quarterly and yearly reporting as per policies & guidelines
- Statutory reporting in accordance with local laws and requirements
- Co-operation with external and internal auditors and follow-up of their reports
- Proactively monitor the tax exposure and drive the reduction of the tax rate for the corresponding country/area
- Tax returns for income tax, capital tax and indirect taxes

Net Working Capital Management
- Establishes local credit policies (if needed) and ensures adherence to Group guidelines
- Strict monitoring of accounts receivables and respective reporting to Regional office
- Proactively drives the reduction of DSO and overdue receivables as well as the extension of the DPO for the corresponding country as per targets

General
- Assures appropriate staffing and corresponding training
- Support Group and Regional management in all finance related issues / projects
- Special tasks as per Group or Regional management
- Maintains and communicates local policies and amendments for group policies
Job Requirement:

- Degree holder in Accounting / Finance / Auditing/ CPA

- Project management skills
- Ability to prepare and work with reports
- Cost optimization oriented
- Ability to work under pressure
- Is familiar with entrepreneurial and strategic matters
- High degree of accountability, credibility and assertiveness
- Organizational skills
- Ability to manage cross functional interfaces and work with different cultures and with remote off-shore partners
- Strong communication, presentation and interpersonal skills
- Team player
- Fluent in English for both written and spoken

Job Description:
1. JD & JR: Maintain the work structure by updating job requirements and job descriptions for all positions
2. Recruitment: Maintain organization staff by establishing a recruiting, testing, and interviewing program, counseling managers on candidate selection; conducting and analyzing exit interviews; recommending changes
3. Staff & Teacher: discipline, quality of teaching, attendance, communication, teaching schedule, counseling, attitude, grooming, participation & engagement, events & activities, training, observation and evaluation, etc.
4. Performance Appraisal: Work hand-in-hand with ELT Management team and Head of Departments to analyze staff's performance (Probationary, Yearly and Special Case)
5. Up to date: Maintain management guideline by preparing, updating, and recommending human resource policies and procedures.
6. Employee benefits: Leave benefits, scholarship, NSSF, Visa extension, work permit
7. Government: Ensure legal compliance by monitoring and implementing applicable labor law requirements by government, conducting investigations, maintaining records, representing the organization at hearings
8. Document Management: Prepare, manage & Archive all documents both hard & soft. Maintain historical human resource records by designing a filing and retrieval system, keeping past and current records. Develop all procedures which are relevant to Human Resource Management 
9. Teamwork & motivation: promote positivity, teamwork, challenging working environment, engagement, involvement, team spirit, and growth for all teachers, students and academic team.
10. Operation: Hearing and solving employee grievance; counseling employees and supervisors
11. Orientation: Ensure planning, monitoring, and appraisal of employee work results by training managers to coach and discipline employees; scheduling management conference with employees
12. Payroll: Ensure all staff and teachers received their paycheck on time and correct (twice per month)
13. Training: Staff and teachers development including technical & people skills
14. Audit: Auditing HR documents
15. Confidential: Responsible for a secure and confidential staff and teachers’ salary services including paycheck, deposit and other fees. Secures financial information and other confidential data
Job Requirement:
Job Requirement 

• Master Degree in Management/ Business Administration/Human Resources
• A minimum of 5 years working experience in HR field (HR Manager)
• Excellent in leadership and management skills, communication, problem solving, and time management
• Fluent in English and Khmer
• Skillful in Basic computer, Microsoft Office, and communication app.
Company Profile: ELT Education Co., Ltd is the first company to obtain a License to conduct School Business from the Ministry Of Commerce since May 18, 2016. Job Description:
Analysis & forecasting 

• Conduct current and future forecasting analysis, insuring to meet maximum accuracy forecasting 

• Assemble and analyze all data to creating the sales forecast (historical sales, market trends, seasonality, 

promotions, and inventory levels)

• Lead forecast and inventory planning meetings with Sale and Marketing Managers, reviewing recommended 

sales forecasts and inventory goals (emphasis on brand transitions, new product introduction, and promotions)

• Make recommended adjustments to forecast and inventory targets based on changes in demand and market 

trends

• Monitor SKU levels and recommend SKU rationalization initiatives in the future

• Prepare, report, and communicate forecast and inventory measurements to management (forecast accuracy, 

inventory plan vs. targets)

• Keep tracking short shelf life product and slow moving product to clear with marketing and sale teams

Procedure and coordination 

• Coordinate with supplier of available stock shipping out and shipment schedule

• Coordinate with supplier of shipping document and importation process

• Issue PO from SAP System

• Monthly inventory report and rolling order plan to supplier

• Other tasks assigned by manager
Job Requirement:
• 2 years experience in Demand planning 

• Experience in FMCG Demand planning is an advantage

• Knowledge of importation clearance process is an advantage

• Knowledge of SAP system is an advantage

• Good in data analysis and forecasting 

• Good in Microsoft word and Power point

• Professionally in Microsoft Advance Excel

• Very Good in English speaking and writing 

• Good in interpersonal skill
Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Job Description:
** Job Objective:
To ensure the quality of loans and prevent any risk to the bank. 

** Main Duties
- Assess loan application and quality check within defined guidelines and policies of each product.
- Conduct independent credit risk assessments on loan applications and submit to loan committee for approval.
- Conduct on site visit for necessary cases, including suspicious cases and accordingly providing independent observation.
- Examine financial transactions and credit history case by case (applications, statements, balance sheets, legal documents etc.). 
- Evaluate the financial status of clients including financial ratios, trend, cash flow analysis, and financial projections 
- Evaluate clients’ credit data and financial statements in order to determine the degree of risk involved in lending money to them 
- Analyze the data and preparing reports about the degree of risk in lending money to clients  Analyze client records and using the data to recommend payment plans
- Monitor loans for compliance.
- Draft models of credit information that predicts trends and patterns.
- Make a plan for annual credit review (twice a year).
- Making recommendations about procedural/policy changes.
- Other tasks assigned by management.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in the field of Banking/Finance or related degree
- Minimum of Three (3) years’ experience in the Assessment department or leasing company
- Able to use Microsoft office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and Internet
- Strong analytic and financial skills
- Attention to details.
- Be honest, highly committed, and flexible
- Able to work under pressure, independently as well as in team.
- Able to use English in speaking and writing (Good)

B. COMMUNICATION SERVICES: School Phone, Email, website, Facebook page, etc.  
C. PLAN & EXECUTION: Implement plan and strategies given by DG and DDG 
D. LEADERSHIP ROLE: Act as Leader, Inspector, HR & Administer, Supervisor
E. DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES 

a. Customer Services: Identify problems with solutions, greeting & general services, communication & relation
b. Lost and Found Service: keep record,  manage lost and found items 
c. Admission & Enrollment: Enrollment, registration, school management system, payments, student interviewing & Placement, application & documents, student ID & Parent pick up card, etc. 
d. Sale: set and meet sale targets
e. Customer Relation Management: Keep record of customer visit & enrollment, follow up & feedback
f. PR & Marketing: Public Relation, events, competitions, media, social media, SWOT analysis, business survey & expansion. Prepare & deliver other school flyers and other related activities
g. Media:  Encourage all photos and videos are liked, shared, commented by students and team members.
h. Parents: Identify problems with solutions, counseling service, communication, relationship, general services, community, support, etc. 
i. Stock: Manage the stock and inventory including books, uniforms, photocopy
j. Call Centre: Communicate courteously with customers via telephone, email, letter and face to face
k. International Study Centre: Promote international study service, generate sales & offer student support, prepare all related documents 
l. Events & Meeting: Organize and facilitate meetings, conferences, and other special events including notation, agenda, room set up including desks, chairs, slide, projector, water, snacks, and clean up after meeting
m. Other service: Promote Food Court, Noon care, Transportation services to customers

F. OTHER DUTIES
a. Respect and act according to school’s vision, mission, goals, all management system, policies and guidelines.
b. Conduct, attend all meeting & training required by the organization
c. Cooperate well with other departments and Campuses.  
d. Prepare daily, weekly, and monthly reports to the immediate manager
e. Perform other duties as required.
Job Requirement:
Job Requirement 

• Minimum Bachelor Degree in business or other related fields
• At least 2 years’ experience in marketing, customer services, sales or related fields
• Excellent in leadership and management skills, communication, problem solving, and time management
• Fluent in English and Khmer
• Skillful in Basic computer, Microsoft Office, and communication app.
Company Profile: ELT Education Co., Ltd is the first company to obtain a License to conduct School Business from the Ministry Of Commerce since May 18, 2016. The Company's former name was American Academic of Language Art (AALA) was founded in 1994 in Phnom Penh Cambodia. It was set up by an entrepreneur from the United States, who believed that education would enrich the people‘s understanding and abilities to help develop the country.

i. Admission & Enrollment: Enrollment, registration, school management system, payments, application & documents, student & staff ID, Parent pick up card, Certificate, etc. 
j. Events & Meeting: Organize and facilitate meetings, conferences, and other special events including notation, agenda, room set up including desks, chairs, slide, projector, water, snacks, and clean up after meeting

a. Respect and act according to school’s vision, mission, goals, all management system, policies and guidelines.

e. Perform other duties as required

Job Description:

To promote and sale Auto loan/General loan products to reach the target.

- Be honest, highly committed, and flexible

position: បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកលក់តាមខេត្ត (ចាប់ពី$500ឡើងទៅ)
Job Description:
ក្រុមហ៊ុន EZ-COCAM( CAMBODIA ) CO.,LTD. គឺជាក្រុមហ៊ុននាំចូលផ្តាច់មុខសាប៊ូម៉ាក C&S ពីហុងកុង ត្រូវការជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិកផ្នែកលក់តាមខេត្ត5នាក់។

លក្ខខណ្ឌជ្រើសរើស :

- អាយុចាប់ពី 20ឆ្នាំ រហូតដល់ 35ឆ្នាំ
~ភេទប្រុស
- ចេញលក់តាមខេត្ត
- មានភាពវៃឆ្លាតក្នុងការលក់ និង មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយអតិថិជន
- ត្រូវមានបទពិសោធន៍លក់ផ្នែកខាងក្រៅ(Sales Out)យ៉ាងតិច 3 ឆ្នាំ
- ជាបុគ្គលល្អ ស្មោះត្រង់ និង មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ ស្រឡាញ់ការងារ
- អាចធ្វើការក្រោមសម្ពាធ
* ទទួលបានប្រាក់ចំណូលចាប់ពី $500 ឡើងទៅក្នុងមួយខែ

Job Description:
** Job Objective:
To ensure loan quality, and prevent any risk to the bank in regards of approving loan. 

** Main Duties
- Conduct independent credit risk assessments on loan applications and submit to loan committee for approval
- Examine financial transactions and credit history case by case (applications, statements, balance sheets, legal documents and etc) 
- Evaluate the financial status of clients including financial ratios, trend, cash flow analysis, and financial projections 
- Evaluate clients’ credit data and financial statements in order to determine the degree of risk involved in lending money to them 
- Analyze the data and preparing reports about the degree of risk in lending money to clients  Analyze client records and using the data to recommend payment plans
- Monitor loans for compliance
- Draft models of credit information that predicts trends and patterns
- Make a plan for annual credit review (twice a year)
- Other tasks assigned by management
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree or fresh graduate in the field of Banking/Finance or related degree
- Minimum of one (1) year experience in credit department
- Able to use Microsoft office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and Internet
- Be honest, highly committed, and flexible
- Able to work under pressure, independently as well as in team.
- Able to communicate in English (Basic)

Job Description:
** Job Objective:
Setting up and operating for Call Center Business

** Main Duties
- Setting up overall work scopes and flows for Call Center
- Establishing and revising all related regulations; policies, guidelines, manuals, forms, etc.
- Checking any relevant rules and regulations regarding to the duties of a call center, especially verifying customers’ identification
- Developing a basic courtesy while greeting and consulting to Bank customers thru the line
- Preparing training materials of basic rules of receiving/calling calls and training staff
- Preparing training materials of bank products with relevant teams and training staff
- Managing and finding better solutions between customers’ requests and bank’s profits
- Building up and improving whole processes of call center operations

- Preparing and reporting performances and/or related issues regularly to managements and/or other institutions
- Any other tasks assigned by line manager
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in Business Administration, Banking, management and related field
- Minimum 2 years of experience in working at call center
- Minimum 2 years of experience as a manager position
- Able to use Microsoft office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and Internet
- Prioritize to find customers’ needs out and satisfy Customers
- Having strong willingness to support Customers as well as bank profits
- Banking business process based on the understanding of IT system to support
- Be honest, highly committed, and flexible
- Able to work under pressure, independently as well as in a team
- Able to use English in speaking and writing (Above the Professional Business level)

Job Description:
** Location: Head Office, Phnom Penh (1 post).

** Job Summary:
IT Business Analyst will serve as the liaison between the executive and IT departments of ABA Bank, leveraging the data the IT team extrapolates while also overseeing the selection and implementation of software programs and hardware resources. He or she will also be responsible for collecting business requirement, translating business needs to IT solutions, project management, business analysis, assisting quality assurance and testing, document processes, and confirm the final documents with users.

* Job Description
- Lead requirements gathering efforts and study the importance of the business case and emit project priority level.
- Understanding the needs of multiple stakeholders.
- Identifying the current- and future-state business processes.
- Helping the business stakeholders envision the future and how their work will need to change to support the future.
- Creating, analyzing, and validating detailed functional specifications.
- Facilitating design sessions with the implementation team to define the solution.
- Work with technical team to translate requirements into functional and technical specifications including UX/UI, Process Flow, Business Rule, Data Flow, Network Diagram, System Architecture, Database Structure, Security Compliancy, etc.
- Work with business departments to write test cases before first product release is done.
- Delivering elements of systems design, including data migration rules, business rules, wire-frames, or other detailed deliverable.
- Assist Development Team to make sure the development is met the requirement.
- Execute the Quality Assurances (QA) testing to ensure that the developed product meet the expectation of the business.
- Assist business in testing the delivered product and link to the development team for any discrepancies.
- Establish project review to make sure everyone learns from the project experience.
- Project Kick-Off: Asists IT Project Management to organize the kick-off and prepare the related executive presentation to introduce important project items such as team, plan, budget and risk.
- Schedule: Coordinate with stakeholder to create a project timeline.
- Milestones: Ensure the successful completion of required deliverable/milestones.
- Reporting: Reports regularly to IT Project Manager about project status and progress.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor Degree in IT, Accounting, Banking or related fields.
- 3 years of working experience in business analysis or a related field.
- Excellent planning, organizational, and time management skills.
- Experience leading and developing top performing teams.
- Advanced technical skills.
- Organizational and Analytical skills.
- The ability to influence stakeholders and work closely with them to determine acceptable solutions.
- A history of leading and supporting successful projects.
- Ability to work effectively as a team member and independently.
- A track record of following through on commitments.
- Competency in Microsoft applications including Word, Excel, and Outlook, Viso, Project, Planner. Knowledge in Office 365 is advantage.  
- Good spoken and written English.
- Good integrity, positive attitude, helpful and high commitment, competence and motivation.
- Hard-working and well-responsible in works.
- Experience in program administration, operating procedures, oversight and monitoring.
- A technical knowledge of IT comprehension is required.

** Closing date: 06 th November 2020

** Interested and qualified applicants should submit only your updated covering letter and CV stating the position you apply for with current photo (4x6) through our E-mail: recruitment@ababank.com or call via 098 630 108
Company Profile: ABA Bank is Cambodia's leading private financial institution (not state-owned enterprise) founded in 1996 as the Advanced Bank of Asia Limited.In over 25 years of development and growth, ABA has significantly strengthened its position in the market and broke into the Top 3 commercial banks of the country. Today, ABA offers the entire spectrum of services to customer segments covering SMEs, micro businesses, and individuals.With 81 branches, 450+ ATMs, 480+ self-banking machines across the country, and advanced online banking and mobile banking platforms ABA Bank reaches out to a large number of customers with an array of modern financial services.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department Office  855 98 630 108 recruitment@ababank.com No. 148, Preah Sihanouk Blvd, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 855 98 630 108

Job Description:
Summary of Position
Support daily operations of the Property Management team; ensure housing units are handed over to customers on time; develop occupancy policies for residents; deal with customer complaints, and maintain the safety and welfare of residents in our housing complex.
Ensuring that these properties are in compliance with all standard requirements/checklists.

Duties and Responsibilities
•Support daily operations of the Property Management department.
•Support on developing and enforcing occupancy policies for residents in the condominium complex such as property management fees, property modification, trash disposal, parking rules, etc.   
•Effectively manage security, landscaping, cleaning, and maintenance teams to ensure the safety and welfare of all residents within the condominium complex.
•Work closely within and across departments to deal with customer complaints related to construction quality, property upkeep, sanitation, and security. 
•Provide on-the-job training and development to the Property Management team and manage the overall performance of team members.
•Manage and supervise the inspection of all vacant housing units and ensure that the units are ready for handover, move-in, leasing, rental, and resale.
•Review existing operational practices in the Property Management department; propose appropriate changes for improvement where necessary.
•Arranging for building improvement plan and budget.
•Perform verification of condo unit reports and present to the management team.
Job Requirement:
•Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Tourism and Hospitality, Hotel Management, or a related field. 
•Advanced level in Excel and PowerPoint 
•Strong presentation, written communication, and report-writing skills in English and Khmer (Chinese a plus)
•Strong management and interpersonal skills
•Ability to think creatively and innovatively
•Ability to work under pressure and troubleshoot unexpected issues
•Problem Solving and Negotiation Skills
Company Profile:

Job Description:
** Location: Head Office, Phnom Penh (30 posts).

** Job Summary:
Commercial Loan Officer will process/originate/prepare Credit Appraisal Report of loan applications for commercial loan Clients, review commercial loan applications submitted by branches to be tabled to CCHO and/or CCBOD meeting for approval, and to monitor commercial loan Portfolio recommended and processed by the incumbent.

** Duties and Responsibilities
- Process/originate/prepare Credit Appraisal Report of Commercial loan applications(detailed loan proposal write up and detailed financial analysis) of those customers referred
by branches or by Head Office.
- Review and work in coordination with branches for commercial loan applications prepared and submitted for approval by branches and present the loan application(s) to relevant approving party.
- Conduct site visit to all commercial loan clients (to their business premise and proffered collateral) to further understand and verify client’s business model and financial soundness and creditworthiness of clients.
- Analyze and interpret financial statements of the business in order to access the repayment capacity and financial soundness of the borrower.
- Analyze, check correctness and verify documents and other information provided by branches and clients in terms of client's creditworthiness, business viability, purpose of loan, financial reports, collateral conditions, and other aspects of credit evaluation.
- Discuss credit-related issues and loan packaging to provide sound financial advises and tailored solution for commercial clients.
- Constantly get updated on guideline, praksas, circular and other policies about commercial loan sector issued by regulator.
- Close mentoring, in coordination with branch, on the loan recommended and reviewed for timely repayment and to ensure Portfolio at Risk remain within acceptable level.
- Good customer relationship management and constantly try to cement relationship with clients.
- Ensure all commercial loan applications reviewed /prepared /recommended are in line and fully compliance with all ABA policies & procedures and with audit recommendations.
- Coordinate with branches and credit monitoring units to monitor and follow up on all post-disbursement conditions and financial covenants to ensure all post-disbursement
conditions and financial covenants are fully complied with.  -  Assist in loan contracts recreation and execution and loan disbursement for Commercial Loan clients originated from Head Office.
- Work collaboratively with other business sale units to cross sell other loan products and banking facilities where applicable.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor Degree in Banking & Finance or Accounting or any equivalent degree.
- Possess strong credit evaluation/analysis skill with extensive business insights related to commercial loans in Cambodia context.
- Ability to analyze and interpret financial statements (audited and/or management reports) of the business in order to access repayment capability and financial soundness of clients.
- Minimum two years of working experience in Credit Department (preferably in Business Banking or Commercial Lending Dept) in Commercial Bank(s) or relevant field. 
- High level of English proficiency in both writing and speaking skills. Proficiency in other languages like Mandarin and/or Japanese will be an added advantage.
- Strong credit evaluation/analysis skill with extensive business insights related to commercial loans in Cambodia context.
- Ability to embrace positive change and assimilate quickly into a demanding role/environment when required.
- Ability to work effectively and efficiently as a team (intra and inter department) as well as individually.
- Ability to apply great sense of judgment/common sesne and both qualitative and quantitative tools/knowledge to provide sound and comprehensive analysis on complex credit loan/
application of commercial loans.
- Superior communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills with ability to influence preferred outcomes.
- Good analytical thinking skill with sound problem solving and great decision making.
- Ability to effectively work under pressure to deliver/complete assigned tasks with tight deadline (when required).
- Strong customer relationship management skill.
- Advanced computer literacy in Ms. Excel, Word, Power Point.
- Strong presentation

Job Description:
** Location: Head Office, Phnom Penh (5 post).

** Job Summary:
Relationship Manager - Business Banking is responsible to solicit, build and maintain relationships with local and multinational corporate clients through provision of highly analytical, professional and well- rounded service presentations and consultations of the Bank’s corporate products ranging from deposit to credit facilities to serve as one-stop and all-rounded Banking experiences for the clients to ensure sustainable and secure corporate deposits and loan portfolios.

** Duties and Responsibilities:
- Solicit, build and maintain new and existing corporate clients in accordance with the guidelines stated in the Commercial Banking policies and procedures to ensure sustainable and secure deposit and loan portfolios.
- Present and provide highly professional consultations to target corporate clients to address their demands and match with the Bank’s products and services.
- Discuss credit-related issues and loan packaging to provide sound financial advice and tailored solutions for the clients as well as to take the opportunity to cross-sell other banking products.
- Act as liaison between clients and internal operations team to timely and effectively understand and provide all types of banking products including but not limited to deposits, loans, trade finances and remittance for the clients.
- Facilitate and collect all clients’ required documents for application of banking facilities to verify their eligibility.
- Gather valid applicants’ financial records by obtaining and compiling copies of clients’ credit histories, corporate financial statement and other financial information.
- Conduct financial analysis and interpret applicants’ financial status, credit, property evaluations, repayment capacity to determine feasibility of granting loans and other credit facilities.
- Conduct a site visit at clients’ business premise and proffered collateral during loan assessment process to obtain in-depth information concerning to the soundness of their business and purpose of loan application and ensure sufficient and acceptable security for the loan.
- Process the registration of the title deeds at local authority and land office to acquire the legal evidence of clients’ rights to ownership of the property.
- Process and prepare Credit Appraisal Report for commercial applications including detailed loan appraisal write-up and detailed financial analysis of the corporate clients in order to submit to higher authority for loan approval.
- Prepare and execute loan contracts and arrange loan disbursement timely and accurately to fulfill clients’ needs and satisfactions.
- Make regular site visits to existing clients to determine the actual conditions of the business and loan collateral whether it should remain the same or be downgraded as well as to develop relationship with clients as part of retention strategies.
- Closely monitor on recommended/processed loan for timely repayment and to ensure Portfolio At Risk remains within acceptable level.
- Follow up delinquent clients immediately and refer such case to higher authority to actively handle the branch’s loan portfolio.
- Handle complex clients’ issues or complaints to find an amicable solution for all and process to higher authority if needed.
- Act as a role model within the team to question, listen and give actionable feedback carefully in order to create a productive work atmosphere towards “speak up culture”.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor Degree in Banking & Finance or Accounting or any relevant field.
- Minimum two years of working experiences in banking and financial services industry with a strong track record in relationship management and networking.
- Excellent customer service; client relationship management, communication, negotiation, problem solving and interpersonal skills.
- Credit evaluation and analysis skills with extensive business insights related to commercial loans in Cambodia context.
- Financial literacy and ability to interpret and analyze financial statements (audited and/or management reports) of the business in order to access repayment capacity and financial soundness of the clients.
- Sense of judgement and common sense with both qualitative and quantitative tools to provide sound and comprehensive analysis/evaluation on complex credit applications;
- In-depth knowledge of the bank branch operations, rules and regulations, laws, granting loans, and credit risk management.
- Ability to use and communicate in both Khmer and English and/or other languages.
- Proficient Microsoft Office and Bank’s software.
- Strong dedication to accuracy and efficiency.

** Closing date: 06 th November 2020

Job Description:
** Location: Head Office, Phnom Penh (1 post).

** Job Summary:
A fantastic opportunity for an experienced UX/UI Designer with a core background in web and mobile, to work on innovative banking solutions within a leading technology Bank in Cambodia, ABA. This is a permanent position based in Phnom Penh (Cambodia) with competitive salary.

** Duties and Responsibilities
- Work as a primary point of contact with cross-functional teams throughout the design and development process, including product development committee, marketing, and other business units or third parties to successfully go from early stage product concepts to launch.
- Present and defend designs and key milestone deliverable to various stakeholders.
- Create, lead and develop all stages of the User Experience and User Interface works including case scenarios, user flows, process flows, wireframes, interaction models, story boards, site maps and assets preparation.
- Design the UI/UX for a broad range of digital marketing deliverable: landing pages, web sites/applications, mobile apps, and more and test them amongst focus groups.
- Document design before handover to development teams for implementation. Initiate and obtain creative feedback from managers at appropriate junctures.
- Integrate user research in the design process; illustrate a command of design methods, tools, communication, and presentation skills.
- Maintain highest level of innovative design execution. Accountable for leading and/or supporting the conceptual, strategic and design development of multiple small- and large-scale projects and maintain deliverable schedules for timely completion of projects.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s Degree in design, Computer Science, or equivalent.
- At least 3 years of professional experience as an UI/UX Designer or Interaction Designer.
- Extensive experience in information design and user scenarios. Experience with standard UCDmethodology.
- Experience working within iterative and agile frameworks.
- Strong conceptualization and visual communication abilities; drawing skills and sketchbook technique.
- Experience in designing visual and interactive interfaces for web, mobile web sites & applications as well as mobile and emerging device software as a UX visual designer, interaction designer, information architect, or similar role.
- Experience with one or more UX design, wire-framing and prototyping tools, such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, Fireworks, InDesign), Axure, OmniGraffle and Balsamiq, or other visual design / wire-framing tools.
- Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for quick prototyping.
- Proficient in W3C standards and cross-browser and cross-platform design techniques.
- Common understanding of software project management and software development practices.
- Experience working in a collaborative team environment, working directly with product managers and developers to define and implement solutions.
- Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills, with a strong aptitude for translating requirements into visual concepts.
- Strong portfolio of works that includes examples from mobile, tablet and desktop interfaces.

** Closing date: 06 th November 2020

Job Description:
• Location: Phnom Penh Capital
• Schedule: Full-time
• Salary: Negotiation 
• Working Hours: (7:00 am – 05:00 pm)

Duties
• Establish the annual master schedule for instructional programmes, ensuring sequential learning experiences for students consistent with the School’s vision, mission, core values, and instructional goals.
• Supervise in a fair and consistent manner effective discipline and attendance systems incorporating high standards in all approaches.
• Oversee the development of curriculum and keep the Chair of the Board apprised.
• Develop all class schedules and ensure that schedules are operated smoothly.
• Oversee the grading and the reporting standards and methods used by teachers in measuring student achievement.
• Oversee teachers to assist in improving students who are achieving poor learning outcomes.
• Organize and supervise all school events including field trips, school functions, etc.
• Commit to and ensure compliance with requirements of all relevant accreditation bodies.
• Maintain a master schedule to be posted for all teachers and staff members.
• Maintain the educational standards established by the accreditation body and MoEYS that examine and accredit the school.
• Oversee the development and creation of partnerships both internationally and locally.
• Be responsible for retention, dismissal, job assignments, performance evaluation, orientation and training of all school members in cooperation with SMT.
• Oversee all tests and examinations by ensuring that test schedules, invigilator assignments, and test papers are proper and ready before test days in cooperation with Heads of Academy.
• Deal with routine school matters, complaints and concerns raised by students, parents, teachers or staff member.
• Be the focal point for any customer queries or complaints in cooperation with SMT and Front Office if queries/complaints cannot be resolved at first contact.
• Coordinate new students and teacher’s orientation and responsibilities.
• Supervise the instructional programmes of the school, evaluating lesson plans and observing classes on a regular basis to encourage the use of a variety of instructional strategies and materials consistent with research on learning and child growth and development in cooperation with Heads of Academy.
• Oversee the student admission process including testing, interviewing, and evaluating of applicants for enrollment.
• Display the highest ethical and professional behavior and standards when working with students, parents and school personnel.
• Plan and oversee the organization’s advertising and promotion activities including print, electronic mailing, and social media.
• Ensure that student master list is complete and current in cooperation with Operational Director.
• Continuously improve the quality of teaching and learning experience of students and the methodology and pedagogy of teachers.
• Regularly conduct/organize teacher training and orientation.
• Keep a strong relationship with relevant ministries and attend all necessary invited meetings with government officials and school partners.
• Lead and work closely with the School Management Team (SMT) to guarantee the smooth operation of all functions of the school.
• Perform other tasks as assigned by the Chair of the Board.
Job Requirement:
• Nationality: Foreign (Native English Speaker)
• University Degree or Equivalent on Teaching Skill and Instruction development
• Well-rounded pedagogy skills and highly disciplined behavior
• Microsoft Word, Excel, and Powerpoint competency
• Will respect and follow code of ethics and child protection policy
• A high standard of inter-personal and inter-cultural skills
• Equity, transparency, friendliness, and good time management
• Strong monitoring and evaluation skills 

Application Information 
Interested candidates are invited to send a CV with a recent 4x6cm photo and cover letter to HR Department by E-mail to career@horizon.edu.kh, or calling 016 500 868. Only short-listed candidates will be contacted to schedule an interview.

job title: បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកលក់ខាងក្រៅ (Sales Offline Executive)
position: បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកលក់ខាងក្រៅ (Sales Offline Executive)
Job Description:
ក្រុមហ៊ុន អេច.អ.ខេ ខេមបូឌា ខូអិលធីឌី គឺជាក្រុមហ៊ុននាំចូលផ្តាច់មុខផលិតប្រេនល្បី Rozzalina (Herbal Products) ដែលជាផលិតផលចម្រាញ់ចេញពីរុក្ខជាតិសុទ្ធ១០០% ឯកទេសព្យាបាលរាល់បញ្ហារោគស្រ្តី និង(Rozzalina Cosmetic) ឯកទេសព្យាបាលស្បែកមុខ និងផលិតផលប្រេនល្បីមួយទៀត KLARITY នាំចូលពីប្រទេសសិង្ហបុរី និងកូរ៉េ សម្រាប់ថែរក្សាស្បែកមុខ និងសម្រស់។ អស់ជាងរយៈពេលជាង ៥ឆ្នាំ មានការកើនឡើងគួរកត់សម្គាល់ទាំងអ្នកប្រើប្រាស់ និងតំណាងចែកចាយបន្ត។ បច្ចុប្បន្នក្រុមហ៊ុនកំពុងស្វែងរកបុគ្គលិកដើម្បីបម្រើដល់ការលក់ ដែលមានមុខដំណែងដូចខាងក្រោម៖

បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកលក់ខាងក្រៅ (Sales Offline Executive)
• តំបន់ការងារ : រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ និងទូទាំង២៤ខេត្ត/ក្រុង (ក្នុងករណីចាំបាច់)
• ម៉ោងការងារ : ពេញម៉ោង
• ប្រាក់ខែ : យោងតាមសម្ថភាព និងបទពិសោធន៍+ ប្រាក់បន្ថែមជាច្រើនទៀត

ការទទួលខុសត្រូវការងារ
• ប្រមូលព័ត៌មានទីផ្សារផលិតផលរបស់ដៃគូប្រកួតប្រជែងនិងបញ្ហាផ្សេងៗដើម្បីជួយដល់អាជីវកម្មរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន
• ធ្វើការផ្សព្វផ្សាយ និងលក់ផលិតផលរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនទៅកាន់ដេប៉ូ ស្តង់ និងអ្នកប្រើប្រាស់
• តាមដានគោលដៅលក់ប្រចាំខែ
• តួនាទីផ្សេងៗដែលប្រធានដាក់ឱ្យ និងគោរពតាមផែនការការងារ និងអនុវត្តគម្រោងផ្នែកទីផ្សារ
Job Requirement:
• និស្សិតដែលទើបតែបញ្ចាប់ការសិក្សាលើកទឹកចិត្តឱ្យដាក់ពាក្យ
• មានសមត្ថភាពទំនាក់ទំនងជាភាសាអង់គ្លេស អាចនិយាយ និងសរសេរបាន (អទិភាព)
• រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ បត់បែន តស៊ូ និងមានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការរៀនបទពិសោធន៍ថ្មីៗ

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005.

Job Description:
1. Execute accurate, objective and high quality social compliance audits by following all requirements indicated in the client specific procedures, auditor training and management directives.
2. Represent the company with integrity, professionalism and skill when conducting social compliance audits around the world.
3. Prioritize, plan and organize work efficiently to deliver first rate audit services and end products such as audit recaps, reports and other client specific reporting tools.
4. When working in an audit team, provide support, communication and training as needed to your partner(s).
5. Learn and understand: local labor, wage and safety laws; labor contracts; client codes of conduct; and international human rights standards. Furthermore, apply this knowledge to assess compliance levels of business practices.
6. Actively participate in training sessions and have the desire to learn and grow in the position.
7. Retain and safeguard documents pertaining to the audit and maintain all audit findings confidentially.
8. Be prepared to travel and plan trips with short notice according to company policy and requirements.
9. Consult and coordinate with Operations Supervisor, Reviewer, Program Manager and other personnel to better understand the clients’ needs, maximize level of service, encourage relationship building, and provide quality service solutions to customer demands.
10. Maintain compliance with BV CPS Employment Policies and Procedures.
11. Perform other position related duties as assigned.
Job Requirement:
1.	Possession of a four year college degree or university degree.
2.	Interest in international labor standards, human rights & environmental issues.
3.	Willingness and ability to travel to other global regions (up to 75% annually).
4.	Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English and proficiency in a 2nd language.
5.	Excellent oral communication skills; capable of addressing high executive audiences and conduct opening and closing conferences in front of multiple people.
6.	Honest, trustworthy and reliable – Able to maintain high ethical standards. Ability to remain, objective and professional in challenging situations
7.	Proficient in internet navigation, e-mail and PC software such as Microsoft Word, Excel.
8.	Ability to work in fast paced work environment both independently and in a group setting and to interact with all levels of staff.
9.	Comfortable with confrontation, diplomatic, easy to talk to, friendly demeanor. Ability to operate  in a multicultural environment with persons varying in socio-economic status.
10.	Excellent mathematical skills and analytical skills. Creative and innovative thinking to problem solve and streamline processes.
11.	Ability to handle sensitive and confidential information.
PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS (in addition to the above):
1. Possession of a sociology, business or international affairs college degree.
2. Preferred languages (written & verbal): English plus Mandarin, Cantonese
3. Previous social compliance auditing experience, supply chain management, manufacturing production, payroll auditing, and/or environmental health and safety assessment or previous work experience in public speaking and/or managing conflict.
4. International travel experience.
Contact Info: Contact Information Seng Sreymarch  017555638 sreymarch.seng@bureauveritas.com Building 1186, St. 371 (Sola), Sk. Steung Meanchy, Khan Meanchey, Phnom Penh 017555638

position: ប្រធានគណនេយ្យ និងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ
Job Description:
 ប្រធានផ្នែកហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ត្រូវទទួលខុសត្រូវផ្ទាល់ចំពោះអគ្គនាយក និងអគ្គនាយិកា​ក្រុមហ៊ុន
ក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងរាល់សកម្មភាពរបស់ផ្នែក និងស្ថិតក្រោមការចង្អុលបង្ហាញរផ្ទាល់របស់អគ្គនាយក
និង​អគ្គនាយិកា​ដោយអនុវត្ត​នូវបណ្តាការងារជាក់ស្តែងមួយចំនួនដូចខាងក្រោម ៖
- ធ្វើការបែងចែកការងាររបស់ផ្នែក និងប្រគល់ភារកិច្ចដល់និយោជិតក្រោមឱវាទដោយធ្វើការ 
ពន្យល់ ណែនាំ បុគ្គលិក ទាំងអស់អំពីរបៀបរបបធ្វើការ និងភារៈទទួលខុសត្រូវ តាមមុខការ នីមួយៗ ។
- តាមដានត្រួតពិនិត្យជាប្រចាំនូវរាល់ការងាររបស់បុគ្គលិក ក្រោមឱវាទ
និងដោះស្រាយរាល់បញ្ហាដែលកើតមានក្នុងផ្នែក ។
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យរាល់ចំណាយរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន មុនអនុម័តឲ្យចាយនូវរាល់ចំណាយផ្សេងៗតាមការកំណត់​ ។
- ចុះចំណាយប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
- រាយការណ៍ជូនអគ្គនាយិកាផ្ទាល់អំពីបញ្ហាទាំងឡាយដែលមានការពាក់ព័ន្ធនឹងចំណាយ
ពិសេសចំណាយដែលមិនសមស្របឬខុសពីគោលការណ៍កំណត់ ។
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យមើល Price list មុនដាក់ជូនអគ្គនាយកគ្រប់គ្រង និង ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់វិក្កយបត្រ Invoice ជាមួយ
Price List មុននឹងវាយបញ្ចូលទៅក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងទិន្នន័យ។
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យគ្រប់របាយការណ៍ដូចជា Finance Summary Report , Sale by item Summary
Report , Cash on hand Report and Cash in bank Report
មុនដាក់ជូននាយកហិរញ្ញវត្ថុចុះហត្ថលេខា ។
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យថ្លៃដើមទំនិញមុននឹងបញ្ជូលទៅក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងទិន្នន័យ ។
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យបញ្ជីបៀវត្សរ៍ប្រចាំខែ ។
- សហការជាមួយផ្នែកបេឡាដើម្បីត្រួតពិនិត្យលើចំណូលចំណាយប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។

- កិច្ចការងារផ្សេងៗទៀតនឹងត្រូវបានចាត់ចែងដោយលោកអគ្គនាយក និងលោកស្រីអគ្គនាយិកា
តាម​តម្រូវការជាក់ស្ដែងរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ។

Job Description:
- Oversee all key channel sales under assigned territory.
- On-job training and supervise the functional expertise subordinates.
- Pricing management all key in charge sales channels and trade promotion implementation in line with trade and brand guideline.
- Work on sales and distribution cost, and recommending for the best practice to create more margins for all product SKUs sales.
- Ensuring to deliver result as per setting target and in line with trade and brand marketing.
- Prepare on step ahead of work plan for sales distribution team to perform better benchmarking with competitors.
- Lead team to implement and execute sales strategy in the Market.
- Providing the activity report on weekly & monthly basis.
- Cooperate with Marketing Team to build branding and marketing activity.
Company Profile: TSNR Distribution Co., Ltd. is a leading distribution service provider in Cambodia with nationwide coverage to 18 main provinces. Job Description:
Plan and Implement sale target by channel, sub channel, and salesperson:
- Base on yearly target by VP 
- Assign to sale channels
- Review and evaluate monthly
- Align revenue with annual business goal 

Build and maintain distribution system:
- Base on coverage target by VP 
- Assign to sale staff
- Review and evaluate monthly
- Align coverage to deliver sale target

Active outlet
- Base on hit rate target by VP 
- Monitor to productivity rate of salesmen
- Review and evaluate monthly 
- Sell relationship with market

Manpower

- Enough resources to deliver business goals

Days On Hand Inventory
- Forecast sales rolling 3 months 
- Identify and action plan on dead stocks
- Identify and action plan on high holding stocks
- Accuracy of forecasts

Credit Limit
- Manage extension on credit limit 
- Control on risk of cash flow
Job Requirement:
EDUCATION BACKGROUND
- Education: bachelor / masters
- Specialty: Business management or economics

EXPERIENCE:
- At least 05-07 years’ experience in sales management position
- Experience in FMCG or multinational companies  

PROFESSIONAL KNOWLEDGE & SKILLS:
+ Specialty knowledge:
- Planning and implementing sale goals
- Build and manage distribution system
- Lead an effective sale team 
+ Job skills:
- Communication, Problem Solving
- Presentation and negotiation
- Analysis of data
- Coaching 
- Project managing
- Leadership
- Flexible

OTHER REQUIREMENTS:
- Proficient in MS office: Word Excel, PPT
- Good Communication in English
- Honest
- Passionate

** Interested candidate may submit their cover letter, curriculum vitae with current photo, and salary expectation to our Human Resource Department.

Job Description:
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យលើការអនុវត្តគោលនយោបាយនិងសេចក្ដីសម្រេចនានារបស់ស្ថាប័ន ទាំងនៅក្នុងស្នាក់ការនិងនៅតាមភូមិប្រតិបត្តិការ
- ស្វែងរកភាពខុសប្រក្រតីនៃសាច់ប្រាក់បុគ្គលិកប្រតិបត្តិការដែលបានផ្ដល់ជូនអតិថិជន និងការប្រមូលប្រាក់ពីអតិថិជនត្រឡប់មកវិញរបស់បុគ្គលិកប្រតិបត្តិការ។
-ត្រួតពិនិត្យសមតុល្យសាច់ប្រាក់នៅក្នុងទូរដែក និងនៅក្នុងធនាគាររបស់សាខា -បង្ហាញរបាយការណ៍ដែលប្រមូលបានមកអោយប្រធានសាខា ដើម្បីឲ្យប្រធានងសាខាទទួលស្គាល់មុនផ្ញើរមកកាន់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងរបស់ខ្លួន។
-ចូលរួមផ្ដល់យោបល់ក្នុងការរៀបចំនីតិវិធីគ្រប់គ្រងហានិភ័យលើអាជីវកម្មលើផ្នែកពាក់ព័ន្ធ។
-ត្រូវធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំសប្ដាហ៍ជូនប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់។						-បំពេញការងារមួយចំនួនទៀតដែលផ្ដល់អោយដោយប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់របស់ខ្លួន។
Job Requirement:
- ជានិស្សិតដែលកំពុងរៀននៅមហាវិទ្យាល័យចាប់ពីឆ្នាំទី២ ឬចប់បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ ឬច្បាប់ ឬសញ្ញាប័ត្រមានតម្លៃស្មើ
-ត្រូវមានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែក Computer ពិសេស Ms. Word និង Excel
-អាចចុះការងារតាមភូមិនិងតាមសាខា
-ត្រូវមានឆន្ទះច្បាស់់លាស់ក្នុងការបំពេញការងារ
-ត្រូវមានភាពស្មោះត្រង់។

job title: មន្ត្រីឥណទានCredit officer ជាច្រើននាក់($260-$400)
position: មន្ត្រីឥណទានCredit officer ជាច្រើននាក់($260-$400)
Job Description:
**ទីតាំងមាន៖  សាខា ក្រុងតាខ្មៅ 5នាក់,    សាខា ចោមចៅ 5នាក់,    សាខា ផ្សារត្រាំខ្នារ 10នាក់,    សាខា ផ្សារថ្នល់ទទឹង 1នាក់។

1.ទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយអាជ្ញាធរមូលដ្ឋាននៅក្នុងតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការ 
2.ធ្វើការផ្សព្វផ្សាយជាមួយប្រជាពលរដ្ឋក្នុងតំបន់ ប្រតិបត្តិការ 
3.ផ្តល់ប្រាក់កម្ចីដល់អតិថិជនតាមផែនការរបស់ស្ថាបនដាក់ឲ្យ 
4.សិក្សាសំណើសុំខ្ចីប្រាក់ របស់អតិថិជនផ្តល់ប្រាក់កម្ចី ជូនអតិ ថិជន ( បើកប្រាក់ជូនអតិជន ) ។
5.ប្រមូលប្រាក់ពីអតិថិជន មកទូទាត់ជាមួយបេឡាធិការ ។
6.ដោះស្រាយជាមួយ អតិថិជនដែលបង់ប្រាក់យឺត ។
7.រាយការណ៍ នឹងធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ជូនប្រធានសាខា ។
8.ការងារមួយចំនួនទៀតដែលផ្តល់ដោយប្រធានសាខា ។
Job Requirement:
1សិស្សដែលប្រឡងជាប់ ឬធ្លាក់បាក់ឌុប នឹងសិស្សនិស្សិតដែលកំពុង តែសិក្សា ឬបញ្ចប់ការសិក្សានៅតាម សាកលវិទ្យាល័យ ។
2.ត្រូមានកាយសប្បទាគ្រប់គ្រាន់ ។
3មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ នឹងមានឆន្ទះបំពេញការងាររបស់ខ្លួន។	
4.ជាមនុស្សមានភាពបត់បែននិងមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់លើ លើការងាររបស់ខ្លួន ។
5.ជាមនុស្សដែលមានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ ជាមួយអ្នកដ៏ទៃ។
6.មានក្រមសិលធម៌  នឹងមានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ ។


** សំណងទូទាត់នឹងអត្ថប្រយោជន៍ទទួលបាន
1.ទទួលបានប្រាក់បៀវត្សចាប់ពី (260$-400$) ។
2.ទទួលបានប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម ថ្ងៃបុណ្យចូលឆ្នាំខ្មែរ នឹងភ្ជុំបិណ្ឌ
3. ទទួលបានអាហារូបករណ៍១០០%ពីសាកលវិទ្យាល័យ 
ដែលខ្លួនកំពុងសិក្សា។
4.ផ្តល់ជូនកន្លែងស្នាក់នៅ ថ្លៃទឹក ភ្លើងដោយឥតបង់ប្រាក់
5.ធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់ ២៤ ម៉ោង និងសុខភាព។
6. ប្រាក់រង្វាន់លើកទឹកចិត្តលើស្នាដៃការងារដែលសម្រេចបាន      
7.ផ្តល់ជូនកាតទូរស័ព្ទ ឯកសណ្ឋាន និងសភារៈសម្រាប់ប្រើ   ប្រាស់ សម្រាប់បំពេញការងារ។
8.ឱកាសចាប់យកតំណែងនានាពីក្រេប៉ូ ។
9.មានប្រាក់កម្ចីសម្រាប់បុគ្គលិក ដែលបម្រើការក្នុង ក្រេប៉ូ។


***របៀបដាក់ពាក្យ យ តាមរយៈ អ៊ីម៉ែល hrkrepofinance@gmail.com ឬ od.managerkrepofinance@gmail.com ឬពត៌មានបន្ថែមជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក 096 63 63 183 /087 487 999

Senior IT Engineer- Knowledge in cabling, network topology, CCTV system configuration, active directory, DNS, DHCP, Cisco, Router, MikroTik, WiFi, PABX telephone system- Knowledge in ELV Security System fire alarm, Access Control, Intrusion, CCTV Camera, Intercom, IPTV/MATV, Parking System etc....- Monitoring and maintaining computer systems, servers, VPN, Firewall, email, backup and networking, cctv security, access control, security system.- Diagnose and troubleshoot technical issues, including account setup, network configuration and security system- Providing technical support to customer/partner and across the company(this may be in person or over the phone or on site support)- Setting up accounts for new users, IT policy and IT procedure- Repairing and replacing equipment as necessaryTesting new technology- Talk clients through a series of actions, either via phone, email or chat, until they’ve solved a technical issue- Possibly training more junior staff members- Responding in a timely manner to service issues and requests- Document technical knowledge in the form of notes and manualsProject Plan, lead project technicians team and daily report to manager- Organize workflow and ensure that employees understand their duties or delegated tasks- Prioritize and manage several open issues at one time- Willing to learn, research and develop new product in order to train own teams and partner- Be able to introduce company product solutions to partners and customers - Well knowledge in Microsoft Visio, drawing, BOQ, Solution Proposal
